en: The hall door opened and his mother peered in, hair like shaded bronze held with black ribbon at the crown, her oval face emotionless and green eyes staring solemnly.
vi: Cửa phòng mở ra và mẹ cậu ngó vào trong, mái tóc màu đồng được cột lên đỉnh đầu bằng một sợi ruy băng màu đen, khuôn mặt hình trái xoan vô cảm và đôi mắt xanh nghiêm nghị.
tr: Koridor kapısı açıldı ve annesi başını içeri uzattı; uçuk bronz rengi saçı siyah bir kurdeleyle tepeden toplanmıştı, oval yüzü ifadesizdi, yeşil gözleri ciddiyetle bakıyordu.
es: La puerta del vestíbulo se abrió y apareció su madre, con sus cabellos color bronce oscuro sujeto, formando como una corona mediante una cinta negra, su rostro ovalado impasible y sus ojos verdes con una expresión solemne.
vi_translation: The door of the room opened and his mother peeked inside, her copper-colored hair tied up on top of her head with a black ribbon, her oval face expressionless and her blue eyes stern.
tr_translation: The corridor door opened and his mother poked her head inside; her pale bronze hair was gathered at the top with a black ribbon, her oval face was expressionless, and her green eyes looked seriously.
es_translation: The vestibule door opened and her mother appeared, with her dark bronze-colored hair tied up, forming a crown with a black ribbon, her oval face impassive and her green eyes with a solemn expression.

en: He studied the tallness of her, saw the hint of tension in her shoulders as she chose clothing for him from the closet racks. Another might have missed the tension, but she had trained him in the Bene Gesserit Way—in the minutiae of observation. She turned, holding a semiformal jacket for him. It carried the red Atreides hawk crest above the breast pocket.
vi: Cậu quan sát chiều cao của mẹ, nhận thấy một chút căng thẳng toát ra từ hai vai khi mẹ chọn quần áo cho cậu từ các giá để đồ trong phòng. Người khác thì hẳn đã không nhận ra sự căng thẳng này, nhưng mẹ đã huấn luyện cậu theo Phương pháp Bene Gesserit - quan sát từ những chi tiết nhỏ nhặt nhất. Mẹ quay lại, mang cho cậu chiếc áo lễ phục. Chiếc áo có phù hiệu chim ưng Atreides màu đỏ trên túi ngực.
tr: Paul gardırobun içinden ona giysi seçen annesinin uzun bedenini tepeden tırnağa süzdü; omuzlarında gerginlik belirtisi gördü. Başka biri olsa bu belirtiyi fark etmeyebilirdi, ama annesi onu Bene Gesserit Yöntemi’yle, gözlem anında en ufak ayrıntılara bile dikkat etmesi için eğitmişti. Annesi ona döndüğünde, yarı resmi bir ceket tutuyordu. Ceketin göğüs cebine Atreideslerin kırmızı şahin arması işlenmişti.
es: La observó, estudiándola, y notó la tensión en el movimiento de sus hombros mientras escogía su ropa de las perchas en el armario. Cualquier otro no se hubiera dado cuenta de aquella tensión, pero él había sido educado a la Manera Bene Gesserit... a través de la más minuciosa observación. Su madre se volvió, presentándole una casaca de semiceremonia con el halcón rojo, emblema de los Atreides, bordado en el bolsillo.
vi_translation: You observed your mother's height, noticing a bit of tension emanating from her shoulders as she chose clothes for you from the shelves in the room. Others might not have noticed this tension, but your mother had trained you in the Bene Gesserit Method - observing from the smallest details. Your mother turned around, bringing you the ceremonial robe. The robe had the red Atreides hawk emblem on the chest pocket.
tr_translation: Paul scrutinized his mother's tall figure from head to toe as she selected clothes for him from the wardrobe; he noticed a sign of tension in her shoulders. Someone else might not have noticed this sign, but his mother had trained him in the Bene Gesserit Way, to pay attention to even the smallest details at the moment of observation. When his mother turned to him, she was holding a semi-formal jacket. The red hawk crest of the Atreides was embroidered on the breast pocket of the jacket.
es_translation: He observed her, studying her, and noticed the tension in the movement of her shoulders as she chose her clothes from the hangers in the closet. Anyone else would not have noticed that tension, but he had been trained in the Bene Gesserit Way... through the most meticulous observation. His mother turned, presenting him with a semi-ceremonial jacket with the red hawk, emblem of the Atreides, embroidered on the pocket.

en: “Old woman!” she snapped. “You’ve courage, and that can’t be denied. Well, we shall see, sirra.” She bent close, lowered her voice almost to a whisper. “You will feel pain in this hand within the box. Pain. But! Withdraw the hand and I’ll touch your neck with my gom jabbar—the death so swift it’s like the fall of the headsman’s axe. Withdraw your hand and the gom jabbar takes you. Understand?”
vi: “Bà lão!” bà ta cáu kỉnh. “Ngươi can đảm đấy, không thể phủ nhận điều đó. Được thôi, rồi chúng ta sẽ thấy, sirra.” Bà ta cúi sát người, hạ giọng xuống gần như chỉ còn là tiếng thì thầm. “Ngươi sẽ cảm thấy đau đớn ở bàn tay đút trong chiếc hộp này. Đau đớn. Nhưng! Chỉ cần ngươi rút tay ra là ta sẽ đâm gom jabbar vào cổ ngươi - cái chết sẽ đến mau lẹ như đầu rơi dưới lưỡi rìu đao phủ. Hễ ngươi rút tay ra là gom jabbar sẽ đâm vào ngươi. Hiểu không?”
tr: Kadın sertçe “Yaşlı kadın mı!” dedi. “Cesursun, orası kesin. Bakalım, göreceğiz koca adam.” Paul’e doğru eğilirken sesi neredeyse fısıltı halini aldı. “Kutunun içindeki elinde acı hissedeceksin. Yoğun acı. Fakat! Elini çekersen, gomcebbârımı boynuna dokundururum... Celladın baltası kelleni uçurmuş gibi, bir anda ölüverirsin. Elini çekersen gomcebbâr işini bitirir. Anladın mı?
es: —Terminemos ya con esto, vieja mujer. —¡Vieja mujer! —gritó ella—. Tienes valor, no puede negarse. Bien, vamos a ver esto, señor mío —se inclinó hacia él y su voz se convirtió en un susurro—. Vas a sentir dolor en la mano, y mi gom jabbar tocará tu cuello... y la muerte será tan rápida como el hacha del verdugo. Retira la mano, y el gom jabbar te matará. ¿Has comprendido?
vi_translation: “Old woman!” she snapped. “You are brave, that cannot be denied. Alright then, we shall see, sirra.” She leaned in close, lowering her voice to almost a whisper. “You will feel pain in the hand you put into this box. Pain. But! The moment you pull your hand out, I will stab the gom jabbar into your neck - death will come swiftly like a head falling under the executioner's axe. If you pull your hand out, the gom jabbar will stab you. Understand?”
tr_translation: The woman harshly said, "Old woman, huh!" "You're brave, that's for sure. We'll see, big man." As she leaned towards Paul, her voice almost became a whisper. "You will feel pain in your hand inside the box. Intense pain. But! If you pull your hand out, I will touch my gom jabbar to your neck... You will die instantly, as if the executioner's axe had severed your head. If you pull your hand out, the gom jabbar will finish its job. Do you understand?"
es_translation: —Let's finish this already, old woman. —Old woman! —she shouted—. You have courage, it cannot be denied. Well, let's see this, my lord —she leaned towards him and her voice turned into a whisper—. You are going to feel pain in your hand, and my gom jabbar will touch your neck... and death will be as swift as the executioner's axe. Withdraw your hand, and the gom jabbar will kill you. Do you understand?

en: She stared at him. He senses truth! Could he be the one? Could he truly be the one? She extinguished the excitement, reminding herself: “Hope clouds observation.”
vi: Bà ta nhìn cậu chăm chăm. Nó cảm nhận được sự thật! Nó có thể là người đó không? Nó có thể thực sự là người đó sao?Bà ta thôi kích động, tự nhắc nhở mình: “Hy vọng làm mờ khả năng quan sát.”
tr: Yaşlı kadın gözlerini ona dikti. Gerçeği seziyor! O olabilir mi? Sahiden O olabilir mi? Sonra heyecanını bastırdı ve kendi kendini “Umut gözlemi bulandırır,” diye uyardı.
es: Ella le miró. ¡Percibe la verdad! ¿Quizá sea el que estamos buscando? ¿Quizá sea realmente el que estamos buscando? Refrenó su excitación, recordándose a sí misma: La esperanza ofusca la observación.
vi_translation: She stared at him intently. He could sense the truth! Could he be that person? Could he really be that person? She stopped being agitated, reminding herself: "Hope clouds observation."
tr_translation: The old woman fixed her eyes on him. She senses the truth! Could it be him? Could it really be him? Then she suppressed her excitement and warned herself, "Hope clouds observation."
es_translation: She looked at him. Perceive the truth! Could he be the one we are looking for? Could he really be the one we are looking for? She restrained her excitement, reminding herself: Hope clouds observation.

en: “Once men turned their thinking over to machines in the hope that this would set them free. But that only permitted other men with machines to enslave them.”
vi: “Đã có thời con người chuyển giao sự tư duy của họ sang máy móc với hy vọng điều đó cho họ tự do. Nhưng nó lại chỉ cho phép những người khác cùng với máy móc biến họ thành nô lệ.
tr: “Bir zamanlar, insanlar düşünme işini makinelere devretmiş, böylece özgürleşmeyi umut etmişlerdi; ama bu, makinelere sahip başka insanların onları köleleştirmesine yol açtı sadece.
es: —Hubo un tiempo en que los hombres dedicaban su pensamiento a las máquinas, con la esperanza de que ellas les harían libres. Pero esto sólo permitió que otros hombres con máquinas les esclavizaran.
vi_translation: “There was a time when humans transferred their thinking to machines with the hope that it would give them freedom. But it only allowed others, along with the machines, to turn them into slaves.”
tr_translation: “Once upon a time, people had delegated the task of thinking to machines, hoping to become free; but this only led to other people who owned the machines enslaving them.”
es_translation: —There was a time when men devoted their thoughts to machines, hoping that they would make them free. But this only allowed other men with machines to enslave them.

en: The fat hand descended onto the globe, stopped the spinning. Now, all eyes in the room could focus on the motionless surface and see that it was the kind of globe made for wealthy collectors or planetary governors of the Empire. It had the stamp of Imperial handicraft about it. Latitude and longitude lines were laid in with hair-fine platinum wire. The polar caps were insets of finest cloudmilk diamonds.
vi: Bàn tay múp míp hạ xuống quả cầu, giữ cho nó ngừng xoay. Giờ thì mọi con mắt trong phòng có thể tập trung vào bề mặt bất động đó và nhận ra nó thuộc kiểu cầu được sản xuất cho những nhà sưu tập giàu sang hoặc các Thống đốc hành tinh của Đế quốc. Nó mang dấu ấn của ngành thủ công Đế quốc. Các đường kinh độ và vĩ độ được khảm bằng dây bạch kim mảnh như sợi tóc. Những điểm địa cực được dát kim cương thượng hạng màu trắng sữa.
tr: Tombul el maketin üstüne inerek dönüşünü durdurdu. Şimdi odadaki tüm gözler maketin hareketsiz yüzeyine odaklanabiliyor, onun zengin koleksiyoncular veya İmparatorluk’un gezegen valileri için yapılmış bir maket olduğunu görebiliyordu. İmparatorluk zanaatkârlığının izleri açıkça fark ediliyordu. Enlem ve boylam çizgileri, kıl inceliğinde platin tellerdi. Kutup noktalarına süt rengi, birinci sınıf elmaslar yerleştirilmişti.
es: La gruesa mano hizo descender la esfera y detuvo su rotación. Ahora, todos los ojos en la estancia podían contemplar la superficie inmóvil y ver que se trataba de una esfera hecha para los más ricos coleccionistas o los gobernadores planetarios del Imperio. Todo en él sugería el sello característico de los artesanos Imperiales. Las líneas de longitud y latitud estaban marcadas con el más fino hilo de platino. Los casquetes polares eran maravillosos diamantes incrustados.
vi_translation: The chubby hand lowered onto the globe, stopping it from spinning. Now all eyes in the room could focus on the motionless surface and realize that it belonged to the type of globe produced for wealthy collectors or planetary Governors of the Empire. It bore the mark of Imperial craftsmanship. The lines of longitude and latitude were inlaid with platinum threads as thin as hair. The polar points were inlaid with top-grade milky white diamonds.
tr_translation: The chubby hand descended onto the model, stopping its rotation. Now all eyes in the room could focus on the motionless surface of the model, seeing that it was a model made for wealthy collectors or the governors of the Empire's planets. The traces of Imperial craftsmanship were clearly noticeable. The lines of latitude and longitude were platinum wires as thin as hair. Milky, first-class diamonds were placed at the polar points.
es_translation: The thick hand lowered the sphere and stopped its rotation. Now, all the eyes in the room could contemplate the motionless surface and see that it was a sphere made for the richest collectors or the planetary governors of the Empire. Everything about it suggested the characteristic seal of the Imperial artisans. The lines of longitude and latitude were marked with the finest platinum thread. The polar caps were marvelous inlaid diamonds.

en: He glanced at his wristwatch. “And you might see that all our timepieces are adjusted for Arrakeen local. I’ve assigned a tech to take care of it. He’ll be along presently.” He brushed a strand of her hair back from her forehead. “I must return to the landing field now. The second shuttle’s due any minute with my staff reserves.”
vi: Ông liếc đồng hồ đeo tay. “Và có lẽ nàng cũng nhận thấy tất cả đồng hồ của chúng ta cần phải được chỉnh lại theo giờ địa phương Arrakeen. Ta vừa chỉ định một kỹ thuật viên chăm lo việc này. Anh ta sẽ có mặt ở đây ngay thôi.” Ông gạt sợi tóc trên trán nàng ra phía sau. “Ta phải quay lại sân đáp tàu bây giờ. Tàu con thoi thứ hai chở quân dự phòng của ta sẽ hạ cánh bất cứ lúc nào.”
tr: Dük kol saatine göz attı. “Unutma, bütün saatler Arrakeen’e göre ayarlanacak. Bir teknisyeni bu işle görevlendirdim. Birazdan gelir.” Jessica’nın alnına düşmüş saçını geriye attı. “Şimdi iniş alanına dönmeliyim. İkinci mekik, personelimi taşıyan mekik neredeyse gelir.
es: El Duque miró su reloj. —Y comprueba que todos nuestros relojes queden puestos a la hora local de Arrakeen. He asignado a un técnico para que se ocupe de ello. Estará aquí dentro de poco. —Le apartó un mechón de cabellos que le había caído sobre la frente—. Ahora debo volver al área de desembarco. El segundo cargamento llegará de un momento a otro.
vi_translation: He glanced at his wristwatch. "And perhaps she also noticed that all our clocks need to be adjusted to Arrakeen local time. I just appointed a technician to take care of this. He will be here shortly." He brushed a strand of hair from her forehead. "I have to return to the landing field now. The second shuttle carrying my reserve troops will land at any moment."
tr_translation: The Duke glanced at his wristwatch. “Remember, all clocks will be set to Arrakeen time. I have assigned a technician to this task. He will be here shortly.” He brushed back the hair that had fallen onto Jessica’s forehead. “Now I must return to the landing area. The second shuttle, the one carrying my personnel, will arrive soon.”
es_translation: The Duke looked at his watch. —And make sure all our clocks are set to Arrakeen local time. I've assigned a technician to take care of it. He will be here shortly. —He brushed aside a lock of hair that had fallen over his forehead—. Now I must return to the landing area. The second shipment will arrive any moment now.

en: “Ah, no! The body’s water is scant enough ‘thout gushing a wasteful lot of it into the air. You did the thing right.”
vi: “Ồ, không! Nước của cơ thể chỉ vừa đủ dùng, thật lãng phí nếu để nó phun ra không khí nhiều quá. Lệnh bà làm thế là đúng lắm.”
tr: “Yo, hayır! Vücut suyum zaten az; bir de yaradan havaya karışıp ziyan olmasına gerek yok. Yaptığınız doğruydu.
es: —¡Oh, no! El agua del cuerpo es ya escasa, y no hay necesidad de malgastarla esparciéndola por el aire. Habéis actuado correctamente.
vi_translation: “Oh, no! The body's water is just enough to use, it would be a waste to let it spray out into the air too much. My lady is doing the right thing.”
tr_translation: “No, stop! My body water is already low; there's no need for it to evaporate and be wasted from the wound. What you did was right.”
es_translation: —Oh, no! The body's water is already scarce, and there is no need to waste it by scattering it through the air. You have acted correctly.

en: And she laughed silently at herself: Who am I trying to convince? The laugh broke through her restraints, emerging brittle, without humor. “But you can’t buy security,” she said.
vi: Nàng lặng lẽ cười chính mình: Ta đang cố gắng thuyết phục ai đây? Tiếng cười bật ra khỏi sự kiềm chế của nàng, nghe sắc nhọn, không chút hài hước. “Nhưng ông không thể mua sự an toàn,” nàng nói.
tr: Jessica içinden kendine güldü: Kimi ikna etmeye çalışıyorum ki? Kahkahasını tamamen bastıramayınca kesik kesik, neşesizce güldü. “Ama emniyet satın alınamaz,” dedi.
es: Y se rió silenciosamente para sí misma: ¿A quién intento convencer? Su risa resonó entre todas sus compulsiones, emergiendo secamente, sin alegría. —Pero uno no puede comprar la seguridad —dijo.
vi_translation: She quietly laughed at herself: Who am I trying to convince here? The laughter escaped her restraint, sounding sharp, without a hint of humor. "But you can't buy safety," she said.
tr_translation: Jessica laughed at herself inwardly: Who am I trying to convince? When she couldn't completely suppress her laughter, she laughed intermittently and joylessly. "But safety cannot be bought," she said.
es_translation: And she laughed silently to herself: Who am I trying to convince? Her laughter echoed among all her compulsions, emerging dryly, without joy. —But one cannot buy security —he said.

en: Great Mother! he thought. I’ve aroused her suspicions! Now I must use every trick my Wanna taught me. There’s only one solution: tell the truth as far as I can.
vi: Mẹ Vĩ đại ơi! ông nghĩ. Ta vừa khơi gợi sự nghi ngờ của cô ấy! Giờ thì ta phải sử dụng tất cả thủ thuật mà Wanna đã dạy ta. Chỉ có một giải pháp duy nhất: nói sự thật trong chừng mực ta có thể.
tr: Yueh Yüce Ana! diye düşündü. Şüphelendi! Şimdi Wanna’mın öğrettiği her numarayı kullanmalıyım. Tek bir çözüm var: gerçeğe olabildiğince yakın konuşmalıyım.
es: ¡Gran Madre!, pensó Yueh. ¡He despertado sus sospechas! Ahora debo emplear todos los trucos que me enseñó mi Wanna. Es la única solución: decirle la verdad tanto como pueda.
vi_translation: Oh Great Mother! he thought. I have just aroused her suspicion! Now I must use all the tricks that Wanna taught me. There is only one solution: tell the truth as much as I can.
tr_translation: Yueh Great Mother! he thought. He suspects! Now I must use every trick Wanna taught me. There is only one solution: I must speak as close to the truth as possible.
es_translation: Great Mother!, thought Yueh. I have awakened her suspicions! Now I must use all the tricks my Wanna taught me. It's the only solution: tell her the truth as much as I can.

en: “I am thinking that the spice brings six hundred and twenty thousand solaris the decagram on the open market right now. That is wealth to buy many things.”
vi: “Tôi đang nghĩ rằng trong thời điểm hiện tại, cứ một đề ca gam hương dược thì đem lại sáu trăm hai mươi ngàn solari trên thị trường mở. Đó là cả một tài sản có thể mua được rất nhiều thứ.”
tr: “Baharatın on gramının serbest pazarda altı yüz yirmi bin solari ettiğini düşünüyorum. Bu parayla çok şey alınır.
es: —Pienso que la especia vale actualmente seiscientos veinte mil solaris el decagramo, en el mercado libre. Es una riqueza que puede comprar tantas cosas.
vi_translation: "I am thinking that at the present time, one decagram of spice brings six hundred and twenty thousand solari on the open market. That is a fortune that can buy many things."
tr_translation: "I think that ten grams of spice fetches six hundred and twenty thousand solari in the free market. A lot can be bought with that money."
es_translation: —I think that the spice is currently worth six hundred and twenty thousand solaris per decagram on the open market. It is a wealth that can buy so many things.

en: Presently, she took a deep breath, said, “Leto’s right—these rooms are nicer than the ones in the other sections of the house.” She turned, sweeping the room with her gaze. “If you’ll excuse me, Wellington, I want another look through this wing before I assign quarters.”
vi: Ngay sau đó, nàng hít một hơi sâu, nói: “Leto nói đúng - những phòng này đẹp hơn phòng ở các khu khác trong ngôi nhà.” Nàng quay người, nhìn đăm đăm khắp căn phòng. “Nếu ông thứ lỗi cho tôi, Wellington, tôi muốn nhìn kỹ hơn chái nhà này trước khi tôi phân chỗ ở.”
tr: Sonra Jessica derin bir nefes alıp, “Leto haklıymış... Bu odalar evin diğer kısımlarındaki odalardan daha güzel,” dedi. Dönüp odayı inceledi. “İzninle Wellington, odaları paylaştırmadan önce bu kanada bir göz atmak istiyorum.
es: Tras un instante, Jessica inspiró profundamente y dijo: —Leto tiene razón... esas habitaciones son más acogedoras que las de las otras secciones de la casa. —Se volvió, recorriendo la estancia con la mirada—. Si queréis excusarme, Wellington, me gustaría echar otra ojeada a toda esta ala antes de asignar los apartamentos.
vi_translation: Immediately after, she took a deep breath and said, "Leto is right - these rooms are more beautiful than the rooms in other parts of the house." She turned around, staring intently around the room. "If you would excuse me, Wellington, I would like to take a closer look at this wing of the house before I allocate the accommodations."
tr_translation: Then Jessica took a deep breath and said, "Leto was right... These rooms are more beautiful than the rooms in other parts of the house," she said. She turned and examined the room. "With your permission, Wellington, I want to take a look at this wing before we allocate the rooms."
es_translation: After a moment, Jessica took a deep breath and said: —Leto is right... those rooms are cozier than those in the other sections of the house. —He turned, scanning the room with his eyes—. If you will excuse me, Wellington, I would like to take another look at this entire wing before assigning the apartments.

en: “Your mother told me. I met her at the stairs to the weirding room down the hall.” She pointed to her right. “Your father’s men are still waiting.”
vi: “Mẹ cậu nói cho tôi biết. Tôi gặp bà chủ ở cầu thang dẫn tới phòng huyền thuật ở cuối đại sảnh.” Bà ta chỉ về bên phải. “Người của cha cậu vẫn đang đợi.”
tr: “Annen söyledi. Onunla merdivende karşılaştım. Aşağıya, koridorun sonundaki sırrî odasına gidiyordu.” Kadın sağına işaret etti. “Babanın adamları hâlâ bekliyor.
es: —Me lo dijo vuestra madre. La encontré en las escaleras que conducen a la cámara extraña, abajo en el vestíbulo —señaló hacia su derecha—. Los hombres de vuestro padre están esperando.
vi_translation: "Your mother told me." "I met the mistress on the stairs leading to the divination room at the end of the main hall." She pointed to the right. "Your father's men are still waiting."
tr_translation: “Your mother said it. I met her on the stairs. She was going down to her secret room at the end of the corridor.” The woman pointed to her right. “Your father's men are still waiting.”
es_translation: —Your mother told me. I found her on the stairs leading to the strange chamber, down in the vestibule —he pointed to his right—. Your father's men are waiting.

en: Through the windows beneath the spiral stair she could see the great white sun of Arrakis moving on toward evening. Long shadows stabbed down the hall. She returned her attention to the stairs. Harsh sidelighting picked out bits of dried earth on the open metalwork of the steps.
vi: Qua khung cửa sổ bên dưới chiếc cầu thang hình xoắn ốc, nàng có thể nhìn thấy vầng mặt trời màu trắng khổng lồ của Arrakis đang ngả về chiều. Những bóng râm dài hắt xuống đại sảnh. Nàng chuyển sự chú ý tới cầu thang. Ánh sáng chếch chói rực soi rõ những mẩu đất khô trên hoa văn trang trí bằng kim loại của các bậc thang.
tr: Döner merdivenin altındaki pencerelerden bakınca, Arrakis’in büyük beyaz güneşinin batmakta olduğunu gördü. Koridor kılıcı andıran, uzun gölgelerle kaplıydı. Jessica dikkatini tekrar merdivene yöneltti. Yandan gelen yoğun ışık, işlemeli metal basamakların üstünde kuruyup kalmış toprak parçalarını aydınlatıyordu.
es: Bajo la escalera en espiral se veían ventanas y, tras ellas, el atardecer. Largas sombras se extendían hacia el vestíbulo. Volvió su atención a la escalera. La fuerte luz de tierra seca.
vi_translation: Through the window frame beneath the spiral staircase, she could see the giant white sun of Arrakis setting in the evening. Long shadows cast down the great hall. She shifted her attention to the staircase. The slanting, dazzling light illuminated the dry soil fragments on the metal decorative patterns of the steps.
tr_translation: When looking out from the windows under the spiral staircase, he saw that the great white sun of Arrakis was setting. The corridor was covered with long shadows resembling swords. Jessica directed her attention back to the staircase. The intense light coming from the side illuminated the pieces of soil that had dried up and remained on the ornate metal steps.
es_translation: Under the spiral staircase, windows could be seen, and beyond them, the sunset. Long shadows stretched towards the lobby. He turned his attention to the staircase. The strong light of dry land.

en: Surely not a palm lock, she told herself. A palm lock must be keyed to one individual’s hand shape and palm lines. But it looked like a palm lock. And there were ways to open any palm lock—as she had learned at school.
vi: Chắc chắn không phải khóa mã tay, nàng thầm nhủ. Khóa mã tay thì phải khóa lại bằng hình dạng bàn tay và đường chỉ tay của một người nào đó. Nhưng trông nó rất giống một cái khóa mã tay. Và có những cách để mở được bất cứ khóa mã tay nào - theo như nàng đã học được ở trường.
tr: Avuç kilidi olamaz, diye düşündü. Avuç kilidi tek bir kişinin el şekline ve avuç çizgilerine göre yapılır. Ama avuç kilidine benziyordu. Her avuç kilidini açmanın yolları vardı, Jessica bunları okulda öğrenmişti.
es: No creo que sea una cerradura a palma, se dijo. Una cerradura a palma debe ajustarse a la forma de una mano determinada y a las líneas de su palma. Sin embargo, parecía una cerradura a palma. Y conocía varios medios de abrir una cerradura a palma... los había aprendido en la escuela.
vi_translation: It certainly wasn't a handprint lock, she thought to herself. A handprint lock would require the shape of a hand and the palm lines of a specific person to unlock. But it looked very much like a handprint lock. And there are ways to open any handprint lock - as she had learned in school.
tr_translation: It can't be a palm lock, he thought. A palm lock is made according to the hand shape and palm lines of a single person. But it looked like a palm lock. There were ways to open every palm lock, Jessica had learned them in school.
es_translation: I don't think it's a palm lock, he said to himself. A palm lock must conform to the shape of a specific hand and the lines of its palm. However, it looked like a palm lock. And he knew several ways to open a palm lock... he had learned them in school.

en: Even as this thought flicked through her mind, she was bending to seek out the hidden message. It had to be there. The visible note contained the code phrase every Bene Gesserit not bound by a School Injunction was required to give another Bene Gesserit when conditions demanded it: “On that path lies danger.”
vi: Ngay khi ý nghĩ này lóe lên trong đầu, nàng cúi xuống để tìm cho ra cái thông điệp đầy ẩn ý này. Nó phải ở đó. Bức thư này chứa cụm mật mã mà bất cứ Bene Gesserit nào không bị Lệnh Huấn thị của Trường ràng buộc đều được yêu cầu chuyển cho Bene Gesserit khác khi tình thế đòi hỏi: “Nguy hiểm nằm trên con đường đó.”
tr: Bunu düşünürken, bir yandan da nottaki gizli mesajı çözmeye çalıştı. Mutlaka bir gizli mesaj vardı. Notta Okul Emirleri’ne uymaya yemin etmiş her Bene Gesserit’in bir başka Bene Gesserit’e belirli koşullar altında söylemeye mecbur olduğu bir cümle yer alıyordu: “Tehlikeli bir yoldur bu.
es: Y simultáneamente, mientras pensaba en ello, empezó a buscar el mensaje oculto. Tenía que estar allí. La nota visible contenía una frase clave que cada Bene Gesserit, a menos que estuviera inhibida por un Interdicto de la Escuela, debía transmitir a otra Bene Gesserit cuando las condiciones lo exigieran: «Ahí acecha el peligro.»
vi_translation: As soon as this thought flashed in her mind, she bent down to find this message full of implications. It had to be there. This letter contained the code phrase that any Bene Gesserit not bound by the School's Commandment was required to pass on to another Bene Gesserit when the situation demanded: "Danger lies on that path."
tr_translation: While thinking about this, she also tried to decipher the hidden message in the note. There was definitely a hidden message. The note contained a sentence that every Bene Gesserit who had sworn to obey the School Orders was obliged to say to another Bene Gesserit under certain conditions: "This is a dangerous path."
es_translation: And simultaneously, while thinking about it, he began to search for the hidden message. It had to be there. The visible note contained a key phrase that every Bene Gesserit, unless inhibited by a School Interdict, had to convey to another Bene Gesserit when conditions demanded: "There lurks danger."

en: “He has the native look,” the man said. “Put into that cairn more’n a month ago, by the look, and left there to await our coming. Stone and mortar where he came through into the cellar were untouched when we inspected the place yesterday. I’ll stake my reputation on it.”
vi: “Hắn ta hao hao giống dân bản địa,” anh ta nói. “Theo quan sát bên ngoài thì hắn đã làm cái ụ hình tháp đó quãng hơn một tháng trước rồi cứ để đó chờ chúng ta đến. Hôm qua khi chúng tôi kiểm tra thì đá và vữa ở chỗ hắn đột nhập vào hầm chứa vẫn không suy suyển gì. Tôi xin lấy danh dự mình bảo đảm cho điều đó.”
tr: “Yerliye benziyor,” dedi adam. “Anlaşılan bir aydan fazladır orada gizlenip, gelmemizi bekliyormuş. Dün mahzeni incelediğimizde, o duvar el sürülmemiş haldeydi. Buna yemin ederim.
es: —Tiene el aspecto de un nativo —dijo el hombre—. Lo habían metido en el túmulo hace más de un mes, según parece, para esperar nuestra llegada. Las piedras y el mortero estaban intactos ayer, cuando inspeccionamos el lugar. Pongo mi reputación en ello.
vi_translation: “He somewhat resembles the locals,” he said. “From external observation, it seems he built that pyramid-shaped mound over a month ago and just left it there waiting for us to arrive. Yesterday, when we checked, the stones and mortar at the spot where he broke into the storage vault were still intact. I stake my honor on that.”
tr_translation: “He looks like a local,” said the man. “Apparently, he has been hiding there for over a month, waiting for us to come. When we examined the cellar yesterday, that wall was untouched. I swear to that.”
es_translation: —He looks like a native —said the man—. They had put him in the mound more than a month ago, it seems, to wait for our arrival. The stones and mortar were intact yesterday, when we inspected the place. I stake my reputation on it.

en: The men were already boiling in from the field when he reached the yellow-domed room. They carried their spacebags over their shoulders, shouting and roistering like students returning from vacation.
vi: Khi ông tới căn phòng có mái vòm màu vàng thì đám người từ ngoài sân đáp tàu đang sùng sục đi vào. Họ đeo túi không gian trên vai, hò hét ầm ĩ giống như đám sinh viên vừa nghỉ lễ trở về.
tr: Sarı kubbeli salona vardığında, adamları çoktan pistten gelmeye başlamıştı bile. Uzay torbalarını omuzlarında taşıyor, tatilden dönen öğrenciler gibi bağırıp çağırarak şamata yapıyorlardı.
es: Los hombres venían excitadísimos, procedentes del campo, cuando él entraba en el gran domo amarillo que formaba la habitación. Llevaban sus sacos espaciales sobre sus hombros, cuchicheando y gritando como estudiantes al regreso de sus vacaciones.
vi_translation: When he arrived at the room with the yellow dome, the crowd from the yard who had just landed their ship came bustling in. They carried space bags on their shoulders, shouting noisily like students returning from a holiday.
tr_translation: When he reached the yellow-domed hall, his men had already started coming in from the runway. They were carrying space bags on their shoulders, making a racket and shouting like students returning from vacation.
es_translation: The men came in extremely excited, coming from the field, as he entered the large yellow dome that formed the room. They carried their space suits over their shoulders, whispering and shouting like students returning from their vacations.

en: “My Lord.” He gestured with the baliset toward the men in the room. “This is the last of them. I’d have preferred coming in with the first wave, but….”
vi: “Thưa Chúa công.” Ông giơ cây đàn baliset ra hiệu về phía những người trong phòng. “Đây là những người cuối cùng. Tôi muốn đến đây ngay trong đợt đầu tiên, nhưng...”
tr: “Lordum.” Gurney salondaki adamları balisetiyle gösterdi. “Bunlar sonuncular. İlk seferde gelmek isterdim ama...
es: —Mi Señor —señaló con el baliset a los hombres que llenaban la sala—, estos son los últimos. Yo personalmente hubiera preferido llegar con las primeras olas, pero...
vi_translation: "My Lord." He gestured with the baliset towards the people in the room. "These are the last ones. I wanted to come here in the first wave, but..."
tr_translation: “My Lord.” Gurney indicated the men in the salon with his baliset. “These are the last ones. I would have liked to come on the first trip, but...”
es_translation: —My Lord —he pointed with the baliset to the men who filled the room—, these are the last ones. I personally would have preferred to arrive with the first waves, but...

en: “Very good, m‘Lord.” The whipscar rippled to his grin. “‘Behold, as a wild ass in the desert, go I forth to my work.’” He turned, strode to the center of the room, paused to relay his orders, hurried on through the men.
vi: “Rất tốt, thưa Chúa công.” Vết sẹo roi nho mực toạc ra theo cái cười toe toét của ông. “‘Chú ý, như con lừa hoang trên sa mạc, ta thẳng tiến thực hiện nhiệm vụ của mình.’ ” Ông xoay người, sải bước đến giữa phòng, dừng lại để truyền mệnh lệnh rồi vội vã len qua đám người trong phòng.
tr: “Emredersiniz Lordum.” Halleck sırıtınca, çenesindeki uzun yara izi titreşti. “‘İşte, çöldeki bir yaban eşeği gibi çalışmaya gidiyorum. Dönüp uzun adımlarla salonun ortasına yürüdü; orada adamlarına Dük’ün emirlerini ilettikten sonra aralarından geçip gitti.
es: —De acuerdo, mi Señor —la violácea cicatriz se contrajo bajo su sonrisa—. «He aquí al asno salvaje del desierto precipitándose hacia su trabajo». —Se volvió, alcanzó a largos pasos el centro de la sala, hizo una pausa para transmitir sus órdenes, y se alejó luego apresuradamente entre los hombres.
vi_translation: “Very well, my lord.” The ink whip scar split open with his wide grin. “‘Pay attention, like a wild donkey in the desert, I proceed straight to carry out my mission.’ ” He turned around, strode to the center of the room, paused to issue orders, then hurriedly squeezed through the crowd in the room.
tr_translation: “As you command, my Lord.” When Halleck grinned, the long scar on his chin quivered. “‘Behold, I go forth to labor like a wild ass in the desert.’” He turned and walked with long strides to the middle of the hall; after conveying the Duke's orders to his men there, he passed through them and left.
es_translation: —Agreed, my Lord —the violet scar contracted under his smile—. «Behold the wild ass of the desert rushing to his work». —He turned, reached the center of the room in long strides, paused to convey his orders, and then hurried away among the men.

en: “Well, gentlemen,” he said, “our civilization appears to’ve fallen so deeply into the habit of invasion that we cannot even obey a simple order of the Imperium without the old ways cropping up.”
vi: “Nào, thưa quý vị,” ông nói, “nền văn minh của chúng ta dường như ngập quá sâu vào thói quen đi xâm lược đến nỗi chúng ta thậm chí không thể tuân theo một mệnh lệnh đơn giản của Đế chế mà những lề thói cũ lại không tự dưng xuất hiện.”
tr: “Beyler,” dedi, “anlaşılan medeniyetimiz istila etmeye öyle alışmış ki, İmparator’un basit bir emrini uygularken bile eski suikast alışkanlıklarımızdan vazgeçemiyoruz.
es: —Bien, señores —dijo—, nuestra civilización parece tan profundamente acostumbrada a las invasiones que no podemos obedecer una simple orden del Imperio sin que surjan de nuevo las antiguas costumbres.
vi_translation: “Well, ladies and gentlemen,” he said, “our civilization seems to be so deeply entrenched in the habit of invasion that we cannot even follow a simple order from the Empire without the old customs spontaneously reappearing.”
tr_translation: “Gentlemen,” he said, “it seems our civilization is so accustomed to invading that we cannot abandon our old assassination habits even while carrying out a simple order from the Emperor.”
es_translation: —Well, gentlemen —he said—, our civilization seems so deeply accustomed to invasions that we cannot obey a simple order from the Empire without the old customs arising once again.

en: “A smuggler caravan left this sietch while Idaho was there, carrying a heavy load of spice. They used pack beasts and indicated they faced an eighteen-day journey.”
vi: “Một đoàn buôn lậu đã rời cái hang này trong lúc Idaho ở đó, mang theo một lượng lớn hương dược. Họ sử dụng thú dữ để thồ hàng và cho biết họ đã phải trải qua một cuộc hành trình mười tám ngày ròng rã.
tr: “Idaho o siyeçteyken bir kaçakçı kervanı yola çıkmış; bol miktarda baharat taşıyormuş. Yük hayvanları kullanıyorlarmış; on sekiz gün yolculuk edecekleri söylenmiş.
es: —Una caravana de contrabandistas abandonó el sietch donde se hallaba Idaho con un pesado cargamento de especia. Usaban bestias de carga y parece que iban a emprender un viaje de dieciocho días.
vi_translation: “A smuggling group left this cave while Idaho was there, carrying a large amount of incense. They used wild beasts to transport the goods and mentioned that they had to endure an eighteen-day journey.”
tr_translation: “While Idaho was on the watch, a smuggler caravan set off; they were carrying a large amount of spices. They were using pack animals; it was said that they would travel for eighteen days.”
es_translation: —A caravan of smugglers abandoned the sietch where Idaho was with a heavy load of spice. They used pack animals and it seems they were about to embark on an eighteen-day journey.

en: “Justice?” The Duke looked at the man. “Who asks for justice? We make our own justice. We make it here on Arrakis—win or die. Do you regret casting your lot with us, sir?”
vi: “Công lý ư?” Công tước nhìn người đó. “Ai đòi công lý vậy? Tự chúng ta làm ra công lý của riêng mình. Chúng ta làm ra nó trên Arrakis này - thắng hay là chết. Ông có hối tiếc đã đánh bạc số phận mình với chúng tôi không, thưa ông?”
tr: “Adil değil mi?” Dük, adama baktı. “Adalet isteyen kim? Biz kendi adaletimizi uygularız. Burada, Arrakis’te adalet şudur: Ya kazanırsın ya ölürsün. Bizimle birlikte olduğuna pişman mısın yoksa?
es: —¿Injusto? —el Duque miró al hombre—. ¿Quién habla de justicia? Estamos aquí para hacer nuestra propia justicia. Y lo conseguiremos en Arrakis... vivos o muertos. ¿Lamentáis haberos ligado a nuestra suerte, señor?
vi_translation: “Justice?” The Duke looked at the person. “Who demands justice? We create our own justice. We create it here on Arrakis - win or die. Do you regret gambling your fate with us, sir?”
tr_translation: “Isn't it unfair?” The Duke looked at the man. “Who demands justice? We enforce our own justice. Here, on Arrakis, justice is this: You either win or you die. Are you regretting being with us?”
es_translation: —Unjust? —the Duke looked at the man—. Who speaks of justice? We are here to make our own justice. And we will achieve it on Arrakis... alive or dead. Do you regret having tied your fate to ours, sir?

en: He knew the actual no-holds-barred convention that ruled in kanly, but this was the sort of move that could destroy them even as it gave them victory.
vi: Cậu biết cái quy ước bất thành văn tự-do-vô-giới-hạn vốn chi phối luật kanly, nhưng đây là một kiểu hành động có thể tiêu diệt họ ngay cả khi nó trao cho họ chiến thắng.
tr: Kanlı savaşında sınır tanınmadığını biliyordu; ama böyle bir hamle onlara zafer kazandırsa bile, nihayetinde mahvolmalarına yol açabilirdi.
es: Conocía la actual convención del kanly de no conocer ninguna regla, pero aquel era el tipo de actuación que podía destruirlos al mismo tiempo que les concedía la victoria.
vi_translation: You know the unwritten rule of unlimited freedom that governs the law of kanly, but this is the kind of action that could destroy them even if it grants them victory.
tr_translation: He knew that no boundaries were respected in the bloody war; but even if such a move would bring them victory, it could ultimately lead to their ruin.
es_translation: He knew the current convention of kanly was to recognize no rules, but that was the kind of action that could destroy them even as it granted them victory.

en: “My Lord, before you go, I’ve a filmclip you should read. It’s a first-approximation analysis on the Fremen religion. You’ll recall you asked me to report on it.”
vi: “Thưa Chúa công, trước khi ngài đi, tôi có một đoạn phim mà ngài nên xem. Đó là bản phân tích gần đúng đầu tiên về tôn giáo Fremen. Ngài chắc hẳn còn nhớ ngài đã yêu cầu tôi báo cáo về chuyện này.”
tr: “Lordum, gitmeden önce bakmanızı istediğim bir filmklip var. Fremen dini üstüne bir ön analiz. Hatırlarsanız bu konuda rapor vermemi istemiştiniz.
es: —Mi Señor, antes de que os marchéis quisiera que leyerais un filmclip que tengo aquí. Es un primer análisis aproximativo de la religión de los Fremen. Recordad que me pedisteis que preparara un informe sobre el tema.
vi_translation: "My Lord, before you go, I have a film that you should watch. It is the first close analysis of the Fremen religion. You surely remember that you asked me to report on this."
tr_translation: “My Lord, there is a film clip I would like you to watch before you leave. A preliminary analysis on the Fremen religion. If you remember, you had asked me to report on this matter.”
es_translation: —My Lord, before you leave, I would like you to read a filmclip that I have here. It is a preliminary analysis of the religion of the Fremen. Remember that you asked me to prepare a report on the subject.

en: A predawn hush had come over the desert basin. He looked up. Straight overhead, the stars were a sequin shawl flung over blue-black. Low on the southern horizon, the night’s second moon peered through a thin dust haze—an unbelieving moon that looked at him with a cynical light.
vi: Sự im lặng trước lúc rạng đông bao trùm vùng lòng chảo sa mạc. Ông ngước mắt lên. Ngay trên đầu ông, dải ngôi sao như chiếc khăn choàng lấp lánh những đồng xu bạc phủ trùm lên màu xanh đen. Ở dưới thấp nơi chân trời phía Nam, mặt trăng thứ hai của đêm ló ra qua màn bụi mỏng - một mặt trăng hoài nghi nhìn ông với ánh sáng đầy ngờ vực.
tr: Seher vakti çöl havzası sessizdi. Dük göğe baktı. Yıldızlarla dolu, mavimsi siyah gökyüzü, madeni pullarla süslü bir şal gibiydi. Güney ufkunun hemen yukarısında, gecenin ikinci ayı seyrek toz bulutunun ardından onu seyrediyordu... Dük’e alay ve şüpheyle bakan, inançsız bir aydı bu.
es: El silencio que precedía al alba reinaba sobre la desértica depresión. Alzó la mirada: las estrellas eran como un manto de brillantes lentejuelas sobre el azulado negro del cielo. Baja sobre el horizonte, la segunda luna nocturna brillaba en un halo de polvo... una luna malévola, de siniestra luminosidad espectral.
vi_translation: The silence before dawn enveloped the desert basin. He looked up. Directly above him, a band of stars like a shawl sparkling with silver coins draped over the dark blue. Low on the southern horizon, the second moon of the night emerged through a thin veil of dust - a skeptical moon gazing at him with a doubtful light.
tr_translation: The desert basin was silent at dawn. The Duke looked at the sky. The sky, filled with stars, was like a shawl adorned with metallic scales. Just above the southern horizon, the second moon of the night was watching him through a sparse dust cloud... It was a moon that looked at the Duke with mockery and doubt, an unbelieving moon.
es_translation: The silence that preceded the dawn reigned over the deserted depression. He raised his gaze: the stars were like a cloak of bright sequins over the bluish black of the sky. Low on the horizon, the second nocturnal moon shone in a halo of dust... a malevolent moon, with a sinister spectral luminosity.

en: Then he saw the human figures moving into the flower fields, sweeping them with strange scythe-like devices—dew gatherers. Water so precious here that even the dew must be collected.
vi: Rồi ông thấy những bóng người đi vào những cánh đồng hoa, dùng các thiết bị lạ lùng giống như chiếc hái mà quét qua quét lại - những người gom sương. Ở đây nước quý giá đến mức thậm chí sương cũng phải gom lại.
tr: Sonra çiçek tarlalarına doğru yürüyen kalabalık insan grupları gördü; ellerinde tırpana benzer tuhaf aletler vardı. Bunlar çiy toplayanlardı. Burada su öyle değerliydi ki, çiyin bile toplanması gerekiyordu.
es: Después vio las figuras humanas moviéndose entre los campos de flores, barriéndolos con sus extraños utensilios parecidos a hoces... los recolectores de rocío. El agua era tan preciosa allí que incluso el rocío debía ser recolectado.
vi_translation: Then he saw figures walking into the flower fields, using strange devices resembling scythes that swept back and forth - the dew gatherers. Here, water is so precious that even dew must be collected.
tr_translation: Then he saw large groups of people walking towards the flower fields; they had strange tools in their hands that resembled scythes. These were the dew collectors. Here, water was so valuable that even dew had to be collected.
es_translation: Then he saw the human figures moving among the flower fields, sweeping them with their strange sickle-like tools... the dew collectors. Water was so precious there that even the dew had to be collected.

en: Another voice rumbled from the speaker: “This is Spotter Control. Sighting confirmed. Stand by for contact fix.” There was a pause, then: “Contact in twenty-six minutes minus. That was a sharp estimate. Who’s on that unlisted flight? Over.”
vi: Một giọng nói trầm sâu phát ra từ loa: “Đây là Chỉ huy Tàu cảnh vệ. Xác nhận đã trông thấy. Sẵn sàng cho tình thế khó khăn khi đụng độ.” Ngừng một lát, rồi lại tiếp: “Đụng độ trong khoảng hai mươi trừ sáu phút nữa. Đó là ước lượng rất sát. Ai ở trên phi đội ngoài danh sách đó? Hết.”
tr: Hoparlörden başka bir ses gürledi: “Gözcü Kontrol konuşuyor. Solucanişareti onaylandı. Temas süresi saptaması için bekleyin.” Bir sessizlik oldu. Sonra: “Temasa yirmi altı dakika var. İyi bir tahmindi. O kayıtsız uçuşta kimler yer alıyor? Tamam.
es: Otra vez resonó en el altoparlante: —Aquí Control de Rastreo. Observación confirmada. Permanezcan en línea para confirmar el contacto. —Una pausa, y luego—: Contacto en veintiséis minutos. —El cálculo había sido correcto—. ¿Quién se halla a bordo del vuelo no registrado? Cambio.
vi_translation: A deep, low voice emanated from the speaker: "This is the Commander of the Patrol Ship." "Confirmed sighting." "Prepare for a difficult situation upon encounter." Pausing for a moment, then continuing: "Encounter in approximately twenty minus six minutes." "That is a very close estimate." "Who is in the squadron outside of that list? Over."
tr_translation: A different voice roared from the loudspeaker: "Watcher Control speaking. Wormsign confirmed. Wait for contact duration determination." There was a silence. Then: "Twenty-six minutes to contact. It was a good estimate. Who is on that unauthorized flight? Okay."
es_translation: Once again, it echoed through the loudspeaker: —Tracking Control here. Observation confirmed. Remain on the line to confirm contact. —A pause, and then—: Contact in twenty-six minutes. —The calculation had been correct—. Who is on board the unregistered flight? Over.

en: IN THE dining hall of the Arrakeen great house, suspensor lamps had been lighted against the early dark. They cast their yellow glows upward onto the black bull’s head with its bloody horns, and onto the darkly glistening oil painting of the Old Duke.
vi: Trong phòng ăn ở tòa nhà lớn Arrakeen, những ngọn đèn treo đã được thắp sáng trên nền bóng tối xuống nhanh. Chúng tỏa ánh vàng rực rỡ lên cái đầu bò màu đen có đôi sừng dính máu và lên bức tranh sơn dầu lấp lánh mờ tối vẽ chân dung Lão Công tước.
tr: Hava erkenden karardığı için, Arrakeen konağının yemek salonundaki süspansör lambaları yakılmıştı. Sarı kürelerden yayılan ışık yukarıdaki, boynuzları kanlı, siyah boğa kafasını ve Eski Dük’ün yağlıboya tablosunu aydınlatıyordu.
es: En el comedor de la gran casa de Arrakeen, las lámparas a suspensor estaban encendidas para combatir la creciente oscuridad. Su amarillenta claridad iluminaba la negra cabeza de toro de ensangrentados cuernos, y se reflejaba en el oscuro retrato al óleo del Viejo Duque.
vi_translation: In the dining room of the large Arrakeen building, the hanging lights had been lit against the rapidly descending darkness. They cast a brilliant golden glow on the black bull's head with blood-stained horns and on the dimly shimmering oil painting of the Old Duke's portrait.
tr_translation: Because it got dark early, the suspensor lamps in the dining hall of the Arrakeen mansion were lit. The light emanating from the yellow globes illuminated the black bull's head with bloody horns above and the oil painting of the Old Duke.
es_translation: In the dining room of the great house of Arrakeen, the suspensor lamps were lit to combat the growing darkness. Their yellowish glow illuminated the black bull's head with bloodstained horns, and was reflected in the dark oil portrait of the Old Duke.

en: A minor chord from the baliset floated out of the alcove. Servants began putting plates of food on the table at the Duke’s gesture releasing them—roast desert hare in sauce cepeda, aplomage sirian, chukka under glass, coffee with melange (a rich cinnamon odor from the spice wafted across the table), a true pot-a-oie served with sparkling Caladan wine.
vi: Một hợp âm thứ của cây đàn baliset cất lên từ hốc tường. Gia nhân bắt đầu đặt những đĩa thức ăn lên bàn khi Công tước ra hiệu - thịt thỏ sa mạc nướng rưới nước sốt cepeda, aplomage sirian, chukka trồng trong nhà kính, cà phê pha melange (mùi quế ngào ngạt của hương dược thoang thoảng khắp bàn tiệc), món pot-a-oie chính cống với rượu Caladan sủi tăm.
tr: Duvar girintisinden bir minör akor sesi yayıldı. Dük’ün bir el hareketiyle rahata geçen hizmetçiler masaya yemek tabakları koymaya başladı: cepeda soslu haşlanmış çöl tavşanı, aplomage sirian, sebzeli çukka, melanj kahvesi (masaya yoğun bir baharat kokusu yayılmıştı), köpüklü Caladan şarabı gezdirilmiş pot-a-oie.
es: Un acorde en tono menor del baliset flotó surgiendo de alguna parte. A un gesto del Duque, los servidores comenzaron a depositar sobre la mesa las fuentes con la comida: liebre del desierto asada con salsa cepeda, aplomage siriano, chukka helado, café con melange (el intenso olor a canela de la especia invadió la mesa), un auténtico pato a la marmita servido con vino espumoso de Caladan.
vi_translation: A minor chord from the baliset guitar sounded from the wall niche. The servants began placing dishes on the table as the Duke signaled - roasted desert hare with cepeda sauce, Sirian aplomage, greenhouse-grown chukka, coffee brewed with melange (the heady cinnamon scent of the spice wafting across the banquet), authentic pot-a-oie with sparkling Caladan wine.
tr_translation: A minor chord sound emanated from the wall recess. With a gesture from the Duke, the servants, who had relaxed, began placing dishes on the table: boiled desert hare with cepeda sauce, aplomage sirian, chukka with vegetables, melange coffee (a strong spice aroma had spread across the table), pot-a-oie drizzled with foamy Caladan wine.
es_translation: A chord in a minor key from the baliset floated up from somewhere. At a gesture from the Duke, the servants began to place the dishes with the food on the table: roasted desert hare with cepeda sauce, Syrian aplomage, frozen chukka, coffee with melange (the intense cinnamon smell of the spice filled the table), an authentic marmite duck served with sparkling wine from Caladan.

en: “There is no traitor,” she said. “The threat’s something else. Perhaps it has to do with the lasguns. Perhaps they’ll risk secreting a few lasguns with timing mechanisms aimed at house shields. Perhaps they’ll….”
vi: “Không có kẻ phản bội nào cả,” nàng nói. “Mối đe dọa này là cái gì đó khác. Có thể nó liên quan tới súng laze. Có thể bọn chúng sẽ mạo hiểm giấu vài khẩu súng laze có cơ cấu định giờ nhằm vào những tấm chắn bảo vệ ngôi nhà. Có thể bọn chúng sẽ...”
tr: “Aramızda hain yok,” dedi Jessica. “Tehlike başka bir yerde. Belki lazer silahlarıyla ilgilidir. Belki birkaç lazer silahına saatli ateşleme mekanizmaları monte edip, ev kalkanlarına ateş edecek şekilde gizlice etrafa yerleştirmeye kalkacaklar. Veya belki de...
es: —No hay ningún traidor —dijo ella—. La traición viene de fuera. Quizá tenga alguna relación con los láser. Quizá corran el riesgo de introducir en secreto algunos láser con mecanismos de tiempo conectados a los escudos de la casa. Quizá...
vi_translation: “There are no traitors,” she said. “This threat is something else. It might be related to laser guns. They might risk hiding a few laser guns with timed mechanisms aimed at the house's protective shields. They might...”
tr_translation: “There are no traitors among us,” said Jessica. “The danger is elsewhere. Maybe it has to do with laser weapons. Maybe they will try to secretly place a few laser weapons with timed firing mechanisms around, aiming at the house shields. Or maybe...”
es_translation: —There is no traitor —she said—. The betrayal comes from outside. It might have something to do with the lasers. They might be at risk of secretly introducing some lasers with time mechanisms connected to the house shields. Maybe...

en: “I don’t trust your Bene Gesserit motives,” he said. “You may think you can look through a man; you may think you can make a man do exactly what you—”
vi: “Tôi không tin những động cơ Bene Gesserit của Lệnh bà,” ông nói. “Lệnh bà cho rằng mình có thể nhìn thấu một người đàn ông; Lệnh bà cho rằng mình có thể khiến một người đàn ông làm chính xác những gì Lệnh bà...”
tr: “Bene Gesserit olduğunuz için size güvenmiyorum,” dedi Hawat. “İnsanların içini okuyabildiğinizi sanıyorsunuz; insanlara istediğinizi yaptırabileceğinizi sanıyorsunuz...
es: —No tengo ninguna confianza en vuestras motivaciones Bene Gesserit —dijo Hawat—. Creéis que podéis leer en el interior de un hombre; tal vez penséis que podéis empujar a un hombre a hacer exactamente lo que vos...
vi_translation: "I do not trust the Bene Gesserit motives of Your Ladyship," he said. "Your Ladyship believes you can see through a man; Your Ladyship believes you can make a man do exactly what Your Ladyship..."
tr_translation: "I don't trust you because you are Bene Gesserit," said Hawat. "You think you can read people's minds; you think you can make people do what you want..."
es_translation: —I have no trust in your Bene Gesserit motivations —said Hawat—. You believe you can read the inside of a man; perhaps you think you can push a man to do exactly what you...

en: “I have said to you before that we should understand each other,” she said. “I meant you should understand me. I already understand you. And I tell you now that your loyalty to the Duke is all that guarantees your safety with me.”
vi: “Tôi đã nói trước với ông là chúng ta nên hiểu nhau,” nàng nói. “Tôi muốn nói là ông nên hiểu tôi. Tôi thì đã hiểu ông rồi. Và giờ thì tôi nói cho ông biết, lòng trung thành của ông đối với Công tước là tất cả những gì đảm bảo sự an toàn của ông khi đối mặt tôi.”
tr: “Birbirimizi anlamalıyız demiştim,” dedi Jessica. “Aslında kastettiğim senin beni anlamandı. Ben seni zaten anlıyorum. Bu yüzden de Dük’üne sadık olduğunu bildiğimi ve sırf bu yüzden canını bağışladığımı söylüyorum.
es: —Os dije antes que ambos deberíamos comprendernos —dijo ella—. En realidad quería decir que vos deberíais comprenderme a mí. Porque yo ya os comprendo. Y ahora os digo que vuestra fidelidad al Duque es la única garantía que tenéis para mí.
vi_translation: “I told you before that we should understand each other,” she said. “I mean that you should understand me. I already understand you. And now I tell you, your loyalty to the Duke is all that ensures your safety when facing me.”
tr_translation: “I said we should understand each other,” said Jessica. “Actually, what I meant was that you should understand me. I already understand you. That's why I'm telling you that I know you are loyal to your Duke and that I spared your life just because of that.”
es_translation: —I told you before that we both should understand each other —she said—. In reality, I meant that you should understand me. Because I already understand you. And now I tell you that your loyalty to the Duke is the only guarantee you have for me.

en: She began to feel her body, grew aware of bindings on wrists and ankles, a gag in her mouth. She was on her side, hands tied behind her. She tested the bindings, realized they were krimskell fiber, would only claw tighter as she pulled.
vi: Nàng bắt đầu cảm nhận về thân thể mình, dần nhận ra cổ tay cổ chân bị trói, miệng bị vật gì bịt kín. Nàng nằm nghiêng một bên, tay bị trói quặt ra sau. Nàng kiểm tra những chỗ bị trói, nhận ra tay và chân bị trói bằng dây krimskell, nút trói sẽ thít chặt hơn nếu nàng giật ra.
tr: Bedenini hissettikçe, el ve ayak bileklerinin bağlanmış, ağzının da bir şeyle tıkanmış olduğunu fark etmeye başladı. Yan yatıyordu; elleri arkadan bağlanmıştı. İpleri koparmaya çalışınca, krimskell sicimi olduklarını anladı; çekiştirdikçe ipleri daha da sıkılaştırırdı.
es: Comenzó a percibir su cuerpo, la presión de unas ligaduras contra sus tobillos y sus muñecas, una mordaza en su boca. Estaba tendida sobre un costado, con las manos a su espalda. Probó las ligaduras, dándose cuenta de que eran fibras de krimskell, que se apretarían cada vez más a medida que intentara tirar de ellas.
vi_translation: She began to feel her body, gradually realizing that her wrists and ankles were tied, and her mouth was gagged with something. She lay on her side, her hands tied behind her back. She checked the tied areas and realized that her hands and feet were bound with krimskell rope, which would tighten if she tried to pull free.
tr_translation: As he felt his body, he began to realize that his hands and feet were tied, and his mouth was gagged with something. He was lying on his side; his hands were tied behind his back. When he tried to break the ropes, he realized they were krimskell cords; the more he pulled, the tighter they became.
es_translation: She began to perceive her body, the pressure of some bindings against her ankles and wrists, a gag in her mouth. She was lying on her side, with her hands behind her back. She tested the bindings, realizing that they were krimskell fibers, which would tighten more and more as she tried to pull on them.

en: There had been movement in the darkness of her bedroom, something wet and pungent slapped against her face, filling her mouth, hands grasping for her. She had gasped—one indrawn breath—sensing the narcotic in the wetness. Consciousness had receded, sinking her into a black bin of terror.
vi: Đã có sự chuyển động trong bóng tối phòng ngủ của nàng, một cái gì ướt và hăng nồng đập vào mặt nàng, ấn vào miệng nàng, những bàn tay giữ chặt lấy nàng. Nàng đã thở hổn hển - trong một hơi hít vào trong - nàng cảm thấy mùi thuốc mê trong cái vật ẩm ướt đó. Sự tỉnh táo rời xa nàng, nhấn nàng vào vực sâu sợ hãi đen ngòm.
tr: Yatak odasının karanlığında bir şey hareket etmişti, yüzüne çarpan ıslak ve pis kokulu bir şey ağzını doldurmuştu; eller vücudunu kavramıştı. Tek bir soluk alabilmişti, ıslak bezdeki uyuşturucuyu algılamıştı. Sonra bilincini yitirerek, kara bir dehşet çukuruna düşmüştü.
es: Había habido un movimiento en la oscuridad de su dormitorio, algo húmedo y acre se había aplastado contra su rostro, oprimiéndole la boca, y había intentado apartarlo con las manos. Había jadeado, sintiendo el narcótico a la primera inspiración. Había perdido la consciencia, hundiéndose en un negro abismo de terror.
vi_translation: There was movement in the darkness of her bedroom, something wet and pungent pressed against her face, pushed into her mouth, hands holding her tightly. She gasped - in one inhalation - she smelled the anesthetic in that damp object. Consciousness left her, plunging her into a deep abyss of black fear.
tr_translation: Something had moved in the darkness of the bedroom, a wet and foul-smelling thing had filled his mouth; hands had grasped his body. He had managed to take a single breath, sensing the drug in the wet cloth. Then, losing consciousness, he had fallen into a pit of black terror.
es_translation: There had been a movement in the darkness of his bedroom, something damp and acrid had pressed against his face, covering his mouth, and he had tried to push it away with his hands. He had gasped, feeling the narcotic with the first breath. He had lost consciousness, sinking into a black abyss of terror.

en: She sensed a diminishing in the dark. It began with shadows. Dimensions separated, became new thorns of awareness. White. A line under a door.
vi: Nàng cảm thấy bóng tối nhạt dần. Bắt đầu từ những cái bóng. Những hình thù tách ra, trở thành những mẩu nhận thức mới sắc nhọn. Màu trắng. Một khe hở dưới cánh cửa.
tr: Karanlığın giderek azaldığını fark etti. Önce gölgeler belirdi. Sonra Jessica boyutları fark etmeye başladı. Beyazlık gördü. Kapının altında bir çizgi vardı.
es: Observó una disminución en la oscuridad. Primero hubo sombras. Las dimensiones se separaron, aparecieron otras tantas agujas de percepción. Blanco. Una línea bajo la puerta.
vi_translation: She felt the darkness gradually fade. It started with the shadows. The shapes separated, becoming new, sharp fragments of perception. White. A crack under the door.
tr_translation: He noticed that the darkness was gradually diminishing. First, shadows appeared. Then Jessica began to notice dimensions. She saw whiteness. There was a line under the door.
es_translation: He observed a decrease in darkness. First, there were shadows. The dimensions separated, and many other needles of perception appeared. White. A line under the door.

en: The ungainly thumping of her heartbeats evened, shaping out time. She counted back. I was unconscious about an hour. She closed her eyes, focused her awareness onto the approaching footsteps.
vi: Nhịp đập thình thịch của tim nàng bình thường trở lại, định hình được thời gian. Nàng nhẩm tính. Mình đã bất tỉnh chừng một giờ. Nàng nhắm mắt, tập trung ý thức vào những bước chân đang tới gần.
tr: Kalp atışları düzene girdi. Ne kadar zamandır baygın olduğunu hesaplamaya çalıştı. Bir saat kadar. Gözlerini kapatıp, yaklaşan ayak seslerine odakladı.
es: Los latidos de su corazón se hicieron más lentos y regulares, marcando tiempo. Contó hacia atrás. He permanecido inconsciente cerca de una hora. Cerró sus ojos, concentró su atención en los pasos que se acercaban.
vi_translation: The pounding of her heart returned to normal, allowing her to sense the passage of time. She calculated. I've been unconscious for about an hour. She closed her eyes, focusing her awareness on the approaching footsteps.
tr_translation: Heartbeats became regular. He tried to calculate how long he had been unconscious. About an hour. He closed his eyes and focused on the approaching footsteps.
es_translation: The beats of his heart became slower and more regular, marking time. He counted backwards. I have been unconscious for about an hour. He closed his eyes, focusing his attention on the approaching footsteps.

en: “Too messy,” the first one said. “Unless you wants to strangle ‘em. Me, I likes a nice straightforward job. Drop ’em on the desert like that traitor said, cut ’em once or twice, leave the evidence for the worms. Nothing to clean up afterwards.”
vi: “Rầy rà quá,” tên đầu tiên nói. “Trừ phi mày muốn siết cổ chúng. Tao thì tao khoái làm cho nhẹ nhàng êm thấm. Ném chúng vào sa mạc như tên phản bội kia nói, rạch vài đường để lại dấu vết cho lũ sâu. Rồi thì chẳng còn gì để mà dọn dẹp nữa.”
tr: Birinci asker “Ortalık kanlanır,” dedi. “Onları boğmak istersen o başka. Ama ben temiz iş severim. Hainin söylediği gibi, onları çöle bırakıp üzerlerinde bir iki yara da açtık mı, gerisi solucanlara kalır. Ortada kanıt filan da kalmaz.
es: —Demasiado sucio —dijo el primero—. A menos que quieras estrangularla. Yo prefiero las cosas limpias. Los dejaremos en el desierto, como ha dicho el traidor, los golpearemos una o dos veces, y dejaremos la evidencia para los gusanos. Así, luego no tendremos que limpiar nada.
vi_translation: “Too troublesome,” the first one said. “Unless you want to strangle them. As for me, I prefer to do it smoothly and quietly. Throw them into the desert like that traitor suggested, make a few cuts to leave traces for the worms. Then there will be nothing left to clean up.”
tr_translation: The first soldier said, "The place will get bloody." "If you want to drown them, that's different. But I prefer a clean job. As the traitor suggested, if we leave them in the desert and make a few wounds on them, the rest will be up to the worms. There won't be any evidence left."
es_translation: —Too dirty —said the first one—. Unless you want to strangle her. I prefer things clean. We'll leave them in the desert, as the traitor said, we'll hit them once or twice, and leave the evidence for the worms. That way, we won't have to clean anything later.

en: A guard stood at the open rear door of the house, his attention focused on the lighted hall and men banging through there, searching from room to room.
vi: Một tên lính gác đứng bên cánh cửa đang mở ở phía sau nhà, tập trung chú ý vào tiền sảnh được chiếu sáng và những tên lính đang đóng mở cửa sầm sập ở đó, tìm kiếm hết phòng này sang phòng khác.
tr: Malikânenin açık arka kapısında bekleyen muhafız, dikkatini içerideki aydınlık koridora ve odaları teker teker arayan adamlara vermişti.
es: Un guardia estaba inmóvil en la abierta puerta trasera de la casa, con su atención dirigida hacia el iluminado corredor y los hombres que iban y venían por todos lados, inspeccionando las habitaciones.
vi_translation: A guard stood by the open door at the back of the house, focusing his attention on the brightly lit lobby and the soldiers who were slamming doors open and shut, searching from room to room.
tr_translation: The guard waiting at the open back door of the mansion had focused his attention on the brightly lit corridor inside and the men searching the rooms one by one.
es_translation: A guard stood motionless in the open back door of the house, with his attention directed towards the illuminated corridor and the men who were coming and going everywhere, inspecting the rooms.

en: The guns nibbled at the caves where the Duke’s fighting men had retreated for a last-ditch stand. Slowly measured bites of orange glare, showers of rock and dust in the brief illumination—and the Duke’s men were being sealed off to die by starvation, caught like animals in their burrows.
vi: Những khẩu súng gặm dần vào mấy cái hang nơi các chiến binh của Công tước đã rút vào làm nơi cố thủ cuối cùng. Những đốm sáng màu cam chậm rãi lóe lên từng đợt, cứ mỗi khoảnh khắc bừng sáng ngắn ngủi đó thì đá và bụi lại rơi như mưa - và đám thuộc hạ của Công tước đang bị cô lập cho chết đói, bị mắc kẹt như những con thú ở trong hang.
tr: Toplar, Dük’ün savaşçılarının sığındığı mağaraları dövüyordu. Patlamaların turuncu ışıkları, kaya ve toz yağmurlarını anlık olarak sergiliyordu... Dük’ün adamları mağaralara hapsediliyordu; inlerinde kısılı kalmış hayvanlar gibi açlıktan öleceklerdi.
es: Los cañones arrasaban las cavernas donde los hombres del Duque habían encontrado refugio para una última y desesperada resistencia. Lentos y medidos relámpagos de luz anaranjada, lluvia de rocas y polvo entrevistos por breves instantes a la luz de las explosiones... y los hombres del Duque sitiados por siempre allí dentro, destinados a morir de hambre, cazados como animales en sus madrigueras.
vi_translation: The guns gradually gnawed into the caves where the Duke's warriors had retreated to make their final stand. Orange sparks slowly flared up in bursts, and with each brief moment of brightness, rocks and dust fell like rain - and the Duke's followers, isolated and starved, were trapped like beasts in their dens.
tr_translation: The cannons were pounding the caves where the Duke's warriors had taken refuge. The orange lights of the explosions momentarily displayed showers of rock and dust... The Duke's men were being trapped in the caves; like animals confined to their dens, they would die of hunger.
es_translation: The cannons were devastating the caverns where the Duke's men had found refuge for a last and desperate resistance. Slow and measured flashes of orange light, rain of rocks and dust glimpsed for brief moments in the light of the explosions... and the Duke's men besieged forever inside, destined to die of hunger, hunted like animals in their burrows.

en: Something had happened to his awareness this night—he saw with sharpened clarity every circumstance and occurrence around him. He felt unable to stop the inflow of data or the cold precision with which each new item was added to his knowledge and the computation was centered in his awareness. It was Mentat power and more.
vi: Đêm nay có một điều gì đó xảy ra trong ý thức cậu - cậu nhìn thấy mọi tình huống và sự kiện xung quanh mình một cách thật rõ ràng, sắc nét. Cậu cảm thấy không thể chặn cái dòng dữ liệu đang chảy dồn dập vào trong tâm trí cậu hay sự chính xác đến lạnh lùng khi mỗi một điều mới được thêm vào vốn hiểu biết của cậu và sự tính toán được đặt vào giữa ý thức cậu. Đó là năng lực Mentat và còn hơn thế nữa.
tr: Bu gece algılarına bir şeyler olmuştu... Çevresindeki her olayı, her durumu sıradışı bir netlikle görüyordu. Bilgi dağarcığına durmadan eklenen bilgileri ve farkındalığının merkezinde soğuk bir gözle yapılan derin değerlendirmeleri durduramıyordu. Bu onun mentat gücü ve daha fazlasıydı.
es: Algo había ocurrido con su percepción aquella noche; veía con absoluta claridad todas las circunstancias y los acontecimientos en torno suyo. Se sintió incapaz de asimilar el flujo de datos, pero con fría precisión, cada nuevo elemento encajaba en sus conocimientos y los cálculos parecían concentrarse en su consciencia. Tenía el poder de un Mentat, y más aún.
vi_translation: Tonight, something is happening in your consciousness - you see every situation and event around you with remarkable clarity and sharpness. You feel unable to stop the torrent of data rushing into your mind or the cold precision with which each new piece of information is added to your knowledge and the calculations placed at the center of your awareness. This is the Mentat ability and even more.
tr_translation: Something had happened to his perceptions tonight... He was seeing every event, every situation around him with extraordinary clarity. He couldn't stop the information continuously being added to his knowledge base and the deep evaluations made with a cold eye at the center of his awareness. This was his mentat power and more.
es_translation: Something had happened to his perception that night; he saw with absolute clarity all the circumstances and events around him. He felt incapable of assimilating the flow of data, but with cold precision, each new element fit into his knowledge and the calculations seemed to concentrate in his consciousness. He had the power of a Mentat, and even more.

en: “We’ve all the evidence in our hands,” he said. “Right here in this tent—the tent itself, this pack and its contents, these stillsuits. We know the Guild wants a prohibitive price for weather satellites. We know that—”
vi: “Chúng ta có tất cả bằng chứng trong tay,” cậu nói. “Ngay tại đây, trong căn lều này - chính căn lều này, cái bọc này và những thứ trong đó, những bộ sa phục này. Chúng ta biết Hiệp hội muốn bán vệ tinh thời tiết với giá cắt cổ. Chúng ta biết...
tr: “Elimizde tüm kanıtlar var,” dedi Paul. “Burada, bu çadırda... çadırın kendisi, bu çanta ve içindekiler, bu damıtıcı-giysiler. Lonca’nın hava uydularına fahiş fiyat koyduğunu biliyoruz. Ayrıca...
es: —Tenemos todas las puertas en nuestras manos —dijo él—. Aquí mismo, en esta tienda... la propia tienda, esta mochila y su contenido, estos destiltrajes. Sabemos que la Cofradía exige un precio prohibitivo por los satélites climáticos. Sabemos que...
vi_translation: “We have all the evidence in our hands,” he said. “Right here, in this tent - this very tent, this bundle and the things inside it, these ceremonial robes. We know the Association wants to sell the weather satellite at an exorbitant price. We know...”
tr_translation: “We have all the evidence,” said Paul. “Here, in this tent... the tent itself, this bag and its contents, these stillsuits. We know that the Guild charges exorbitant prices for their weather satellites. Also...”
es_translation: —We have all the doors in our hands —he said—. Right here, in this tent... the tent itself, this backpack and its contents, these stillsuits. We know that the Guild demands a prohibitive price for the weather satellites. We know that...

en: He turned away from her, looking out into the night. Why can’t I mourn? he wondered. He felt that every fiber of his being craved this release, but it would be denied him forever.
vi: Cậu quay đi, nhìn ra ngoài bóng đêm. Tại sao mình không thể khóc thương? cậu tự hỏi. Cậu cảm thấy mọi đường gân thớ thịt trong mình đều khao khát sự giải thoát này, nhưng mãi mãi bị cậu từ chối.
tr: Paul, Jessica’ya sırtını dönüp geceye baktı. Niye yas tutamıyorum? diye merak etti. Tüm varlığıyla yas tutmak istediğini hissediyordu, ama bunu asla yapamayacaktı.
es: Se volvió de espaldas a ella, mirando afuera, a la noche. ¿Por qué no puedo llorar?, se maravilló. Sintió cada fibra de su ser anhelando aquel desahogo, pero sabía que le sería negado por siempre.
vi_translation: He turned away, looking out into the night. Why can't I cry in mourning? he asked himself. He felt every sinew and muscle within him yearning for this release, but it was forever denied by him.
tr_translation: Paul turned his back to Jessica and looked into the night. Why can't I mourn? he wondered. He felt with his entire being that he wanted to mourn, but he would never be able to do it.
es_translation: He turned his back to her, looking outside, at the night. Why can't I cry?, he wondered. He felt every fiber of his being yearning for that release, but he knew it would be denied to him forever.

en: The thing was a spectrum of possibilities from the most remote past to the most remote future—from the most probable to the most improbable. He saw his own death in countless ways. He saw new planets, new cultures.
vi: Cả khung cảnh đó là một chuỗi những sự kiện có khả năng xảy ra từ quá khứ xa xăm nhất đến tương lai xa xăm nhất - từ sự kiện nhiều khả năng xảy ra nhất đến sự kiện ít khả năng xảy ra nhất. Cậu thấy cái chết của chính mình theo vô số cách. Cậu thấy những hành tinh mới, những nền văn hóa mới.
tr: Gördüğü şey, en uzak geçmişten en uzak geleceğe dek uzanan bir olasılıklar yelpazesiydi. Kendi ölümünü sayısız şekillerde görüyordu. Yeni gezegenler, yeni medeniyetler görüyordu.
es: El todo era un espectro de posibilidades desde el más remoto pasado hasta el más remoto futuro... desde lo más probable a lo más improbable. Vio su propia muerte en innumerables versiones. Vio nuevos planetas, nuevas culturas.
vi_translation: The entire scene is a sequence of events that could occur from the most distant past to the most distant future - from the most likely event to the least likely event. He saw his own death in countless ways. He saw new planets, new cultures.
tr_translation: What he saw was a spectrum of possibilities stretching from the most distant past to the most distant future. He saw his own death in countless ways. He saw new planets, new civilizations.
es_translation: The whole was a spectrum of possibilities from the most remote past to the most remote future... from the most probable to the most improbable. He saw his own death in countless versions. He saw new planets, new cultures.

en: There’s no more childhood in his voice, she thought. And she said: “I hoped the thing any parent hopes—that you’d be … superior, different.”
vi: Không còn chút trẻ con nào trong giọng thằng bé, nàng nghĩ. Nàng nói: “Mẹ hy vọng điều mà bất cứ người mẹ nào cũng hy vọng - rằng con sẽ trở thành... người ưu tú, thật khác biệt.
tr: Jessica, Sesinde çocuksuluktan eser kalmadı, diye düşündü. “Her ebeveyn gibi... senin üstün olduğunu... farklı olduğunu umuyordum.
es: No hay ningún rastro de niño en su voz, pensó ella. Y dijo: —Esperaba lo que esperan todos los padres: que fueras... superior, distinto.
vi_translation: There was no trace of childishness in the boy's voice, she thought. She said: "I hope for what any mother would hope for - that you will become... an exceptional person, truly different."
tr_translation: Jessica thought, there's no trace of childishness left in Sesinde. "Like every parent... I hoped you were superior... that you were different."
es_translation: There is no trace of a child in his voice, she thought. And she said: —I expected what all parents expect: that you would be... superior, different.

en: “The spice,” he said. “It’s in everything here—the air, the soil, the food, the geriatric spice. It’s like the Truthsayer drug. It’s a poison!”
vi: “Hương dược,” cậu nói. “Nó có trong mọi thứ ở đây - trong không khí, trong đất, trong thức ăn, cái hương dược chống lão hóa. Nó giống như thuốc của Người Nói Sự thật. Nó là chất độc!”
tr: “Baharat,” dedi Paul. “Burada her yerde baharat var... havada, toprakta, yiyeceklerde. Yaşlanmayı geciktiren baharat. Tıpkı Gerçeğisöyletme ilacı gibi. Bir zehir!
es: —La especia —dijo él—. Está por todos lados aquí... el aire, el suelo, la comida. La especia geriátrica. Es como la droga de la Decidora de Verdad. ¡Es un veneno!
vi_translation: “The spice,” he said. “It’s in everything here - in the air, in the soil, in the food, the anti-aging spice. It’s like the drug of the Truthsayer. It’s poison!”
tr_translation: “Spice,” said Paul. “There is spice everywhere here... in the air, in the soil, in the food. Spice that delays aging. Just like the Truthsayer drug. A poison!”
es_translation: —The spice —he said—. It's everywhere here... the air, the ground, the food. The geriatric spice. It's like the drug of the Truthsayer. It's a poison!

en: He took one step along the ledge and, in that instant, heard the low hiss of gliding aircraft, saw the dark shapes of ornithopters above them.
