vi: Cậu vừa bước thêm một bước dọc theo gờ đá thì, ngay lúc đó, nghe thấy tiếng xì xì khe khẽ của những con tàu đang lướt đi, nhìn thấy những cái bóng tàu tối sẫm bên trên họ.
tr: Tam adım attığı anda, havada süzülen bir uçağın hafif tıslamasını işitti ve tepelerinde beliren ornitopterlerin karanlık siluetlerini gördü.
es: Dio un paso a lo largo de la cresta rocosa y, en aquel instante, oyó un leve silbido y vio las negras sombras de los ornitópteros que planeaban encima de ellos. CAPÍTULO XXIV
vi_translation: As you took another step along the ledge, at that moment, you heard the faint hissing sound of ships gliding by, and saw the dark shadows of the ships above them.
tr_translation: As soon as he took a step, he heard the faint hiss of a plane gliding through the air and saw the dark silhouettes of ornithopters appearing above them.
es_translation: He took a step along the rocky ridge and, at that moment, heard a faint whistle and saw the black shadows of the ornithopters gliding above them. CHAPTER XXIV

en: The leathered old face appeared composed in the predawn dimness as he spoke. His sapho-stained lips were drawn into a straight line with radial creases spreading upward.
vi: Khi ông nói, gương mặt già nua thô kệch có vẻ điềm tĩnh trong ánh sáng lờ mờ trước lúc rạng đông. Đôi môi nhuốm màu sapho mím lại thành một đường thẳng với những nếp nhăn tỏa ra phía trên.
tr: Yaşlı adam konuşurken, yıpranmış yüzü seher loşluğunda sakin görünüyordu. Safo lekeli dudakları gerilmiş, dümdüz olmuştu; kenarlarından yukarıya doğru kırışıklıklar uzanıyordu.
es: El viejo y curtido rostro parecía calmado en la penumbra que precedía al alba, mientras hablaba. Sus labios manchados de safo eran una línea recta de la que irradiaban arrugas verticales.
vi_translation: When he spoke, his coarse, aged face appeared calm in the dim light before dawn. His sapho-stained lips pressed into a straight line with wrinkles radiating above.
tr_translation: While the old man was speaking, his weathered face looked calm in the dawn's twilight. His lips, stained with tobacco, were stretched and flattened; wrinkles extended upwards from the corners.
es_translation: The old and weathered face seemed calm in the twilight that preceded dawn, as he spoke. His saffron-stained lips were a straight line from which vertical wrinkles radiated.

en: As though that were the signal, four men slid and dropped down from the rocks above them. They darted back under the overhang, rolled the dead man in a loose robe, lifted him and began running with him along the cliff wall to the right. Spurts of dust lifted around their running feet.
vi: Như thể đó là một tín hiệu, có bốn người vừa trượt vừa thả người xuống từ những tảng đá phía trên đầu họ. Họ lao xuống dưới vòm đá, cuộn người chết vào một chiếc áo choàng rộng thùng thình, kéo anh ta lên rồi bắt đầu vác cái xác chạy dọc theo bức tường đá về bên phải. Bụi cuốn mù mịt theo những bước chạy của họ.
tr: Sanki bu bir işaretmiş gibi, tepelerindeki kayalıklarda dört adam belirip aşağı atladı. Kaya çıkıntısının altına koşup, cesedi büyük bir cüppeyle sararak kaldırdılar ve kayalığı sağlarına alıp, cesedi taşıyarak koşmaya başladılar. Attıkları her adımda tozlar havalanıyordu.
es: Como si esto fuera una señal, cuatro hombres surgieron de las rocas encima de ellos. Saltaron bajo la cornisa, envolvieron al hombre muerto en un amplio lienzo, lo levantaron y se fueron corriendo con él, a lo largo de la pared rocosa a su derecha. Sus pasos alejándose alzaron nubecillas de polvo.
vi_translation: As if it were a signal, four people slid and dropped down from the rocks above their heads. They rushed down under the stone arch, wrapped the dead man in a loose cloak, lifted him up, and then began to carry the body along the stone wall to the right. Dust swirled in the wake of their running steps.
tr_translation: As if it were a sign, four men appeared on the cliffs above them and jumped down. They ran under the rock ledge, wrapped the body in a large robe, lifted it, and started running with the cliff to their right, carrying the body. With every step they took, dust rose into the air.
es_translation: As if this were a sign, four men emerged from the rocks above them. They jumped under the ledge, wrapped the dead man in a large canvas, lifted him, and ran off with him along the rocky wall to their right. Their departing steps raised small clouds of dust.

en: The troop carrier settled toward the patch of blue-clad bodies. Its wings crept out to full reach, began the cupping action of a quick stop.
vi: Chiếc tàu chở quân chao xuống về phía khoảnh cát có những cái xác mặc đồ xanh. Những chiếc cánh của nó trườn ra hết cỡ, bắt đầu động tác khum xuống để đỗ gấp xuống.
tr: Asker taşıyıcı, mavi üniformalı cesetlerin yattığı yere doğru alçaldı. Kanatlarını iyice açıp, ani duruşa hazırlandı.
es: El transporte de tropas sobrevoló la arena junto a los cuerpos vestidos de azul. Sus alas batieron enérgicamente el aire, frenándolo con brusquedad.
vi_translation: The troop-carrying ship swayed down towards the sandy area with bodies in green uniforms. Its wings spread out fully, beginning the downward motion to make a sudden landing.
tr_translation: The carrier pigeon descended towards the place where the blue-uniformed corpses lay. It spread its wings wide, preparing for a sudden stop.
es_translation: The troop transport flew over the sand alongside the bodies dressed in blue. Its wings beat the air energetically, braking it abruptly.

en: “If you rely only on your eyes, your other senses weaken.” It was a Bene Gesserit axiom. He took it to himself now, promising never again to fall into that trap … if he lived through this.
vi: “Nếu bạn chỉ dựa vào mắt mình, các giác quan khác sẽ yếu đi.” Đó là một châm ngôn Bene Gesserit. Giờ thì cậu vận câu nói này vào hoàn cảnh của mình, tự hứa sẽ không bao giờ lại rơi vào cái bẫy đó... nếu cậu sống sót qua đận này.
tr: “Sadece gözlerine güvenirsen, diğer duyuların zayıflar.” Bir Bene Gesserit aksiyomuydu bu. Paul kurtulmayı başarırsa bir daha asla bu tuzağa düşmeyeceğine yemin etti.
es: «Si confías tan sólo en tu mirada, tus otros sentidos se debilitarán.» Este era un axioma Bene Gesserit. Lo hizo suyo, jurándose a sí mismo no caer nunca más en aquella trampa... si lograba sobrevivir a este momento.
vi_translation: “If you rely only on your eyes, your other senses will weaken.” That is a Bene Gesserit proverb. Now he applied this saying to his own situation, promising himself never to fall into that trap again... if he survived this ordeal.
tr_translation: “If you rely solely on your eyes, your other senses will weaken.” This was a Bene Gesserit axiom. Paul swore that if he managed to escape, he would never fall into this trap again.
es_translation: "If you rely solely on your sight, your other senses will weaken." This was a Bene Gesserit axiom. He made it his own, vowing to himself never to fall into that trap again... if he managed to survive this moment.

en: The stupid guard captain had been right, of course. Certainly, nothing survived in the path of a sandblast storm on Arrakis. Not an ornithopter… or its occupants. The woman and the boy were dead. The bribes in the right places, the unthinkable expenditure to bring overwhelming military force down onto one planet… all the sly reports tailored for the Emperor’s ears alone, all the careful scheming were here at last coming to full fruition.
vi: Tên đội trưởng ngu ngốc đã đúng, tất nhiên rồi. Chắc chắn không gì có thể sống sót trên đường đi của một cơn bão cát dữ dội ở Arrakis. Không một con tàu nào... hay người ở trong đó. Mụ đàn bà và thằng bé đã chết. Đồ đút lót đặt đúng nơi, phí tổn không thể tưởng tượng nổi để mang lực lượng quân đội vô cùng hùng mạnh đổ bộ xuống một hành tinh... toàn bộ những bản báo cáo quỷ quyệt được xử lý để thích ứng với riêng đôi tai Hoàng đế, toàn bộ mưu đồ được tính toán kỹ lưỡng cuối cùng cũng thành công tốt đẹp.
tr: O salak muhafız subayı haklıydı tabii. Arrakis’te kum fırtınasına yakalanan her şey paramparça olurdu. Bir ornitopterin... ve içindekilerin kurtulması mümkün değildi. Kadınla çocuk ölmüşlerdi. Doğru kişilere verilen rüşvetler, tek bir gezegene ezici güçle saldırmak için harcanan muazzam para... İmparator’un kulağına gitmesi için kurnazca uydurulmuş haberler, burada özenle uygulanan planlar, bütün bunlar sonunda meyvesini veriyordu.
es: El estúpido capitán de los guardias estaba en lo cierto, por supuesto. Sin lugar a dudas, nada sobreviviría en el camino de una tormenta de arena de Arrakis. Ni un ornitóptero... ni sus ocupantes. La mujer y el chico habían muerto. Todas las corrupciones en su justo lugar, los increíbles gastos para transportar aquellas aplastantes fuerzas militares hasta el planeta... todos los astutos informes confeccionados a la medida de los oídos del Emperador, todo el vasto plan cuidadosamente puesto a punto, daba por fin sus frutos.
vi_translation: The foolish captain was right, of course. Surely nothing could survive the path of a violent sandstorm on Arrakis. Not a single ship... or anyone inside it. The woman and the boy were dead. The bribes placed in the right spots, the unimaginable costs to bring an immensely powerful military force to land on a planet... all the devious reports tailored for the Emperor's ears alone, all the meticulously calculated schemes finally succeeded beautifully.
tr_translation: The sly guard officer was right, of course. Everything caught in a sandstorm on Arrakis would be torn to pieces. It was impossible for an ornithopter... and its occupants to survive. The woman and the child were dead. Bribes given to the right people, the enormous money spent to launch an overwhelming attack on a single planet... The cleverly fabricated news to reach the Emperor's ear, the carefully executed plans here, all of these were finally bearing fruit.
es_translation: The stupid captain of the guards was right, of course. Without a doubt, nothing would survive in the path of an Arrakis sandstorm. Not an ornithopter... nor its occupants. The woman and the boy were dead. All the corruptions in their rightful place, the incredible expenses to transport those crushing military forces to the planet... all the cunning reports tailored to the Emperor's ears, the entire vast plan carefully fine-tuned, was finally bearing fruit.

en: Always, the exorbitant demands rode upon military ventures. “Hazard rates,” the oily Guild agents explained. And for every agent you managed to insert as a watchdog in the Guild Bank structure, they put two agents into your system.
vi: Bọn chúng luôn luôn đòi mức phí cắt cổ trong những công việc mạo hiểm liên quan đến quân đội. “Để bù vào rủi ro,” những tay đại diện ngọt xớt của Hiệp hội giải thích như vậy. Và cứ ta gài được một mật vụ vào cơ cấu Ngân hàng Hiệp hội để làm chó canh thì chúng lại gài hai mật vụ vào hệ thống của ta.
tr: En yüksek ücreti de askeri nakliyatlar için alırlardı. O şişko Lonca ajanları buna “risk primi” diyordu. Lonca Bankası’na gözcü olarak yerleştirdiğin her ajana karşılık, onlar senin sistemine iki ajan yerleştirirdi.
es: Siempre, los costes más exorbitantes recaían en las expediciones militares. «Tarifa de riesgo», explicaban los untuosos agentes de la Cofradía. Y por cada agente que uno conseguía infiltrar en el seno del Banco de la Cofradía, ella conseguía infiltrar dos de sus propios agentes en el sistema de uno.
vi_translation: They always demand exorbitant fees for risky jobs related to the military. “To compensate for the risk,” the sweet-talking representatives of the Association explained. And every time we managed to place an agent into the Association's Bank structure as a watchdog, they would place two agents into our system.
tr_translation: They would also receive the highest fee for military transports. Those fat Guild agents called it a "risk premium." For every agent you placed as a lookout in the Guild Bank, they would place two agents in your system.
es_translation: The most exorbitant costs always fell on military expeditions. "Risk tariff," explained the unctuous agents of the Brotherhood. And for every agent one managed to infiltrate into the heart of the Brotherhood's Bank, she managed to infiltrate two of her own agents into one's system.

en: Cause and effect: he was alive despite malignant forces, and he felt himself poised on a brink of self-awareness that could not have been without the litany’s magic.
vi: Nhân và quả: cậu vẫn sống bất chấp những thế lực hiểm ác, và cậu thấy mình đang đứng thăng bằng ở sát mép sự nhận thức về bản thân mà nếu thiếu thần lực của lời kinh kia thì đã không thể nào có được.
tr: Sebep ve sonuç: Düşman güçlere rağmen sağ kalmıştı. Şimdiyse derin bir öz farkındalığın eşiğinde olduğunu hissediyordu... bunda duanın büyüsünün de payı vardı mutlaka. T. K.
es: Causa y efecto: vivía a despecho de las fuerzas malignas, y se dio cuenta de que se acercaba a una nueva percepción que no hubiera podido tener lugar sin la magia de la letanía.
vi_translation: Cause and effect: you still live despite the malevolent forces, and you find yourself balancing at the edge of self-awareness, which you could not have achieved without the divine power of that prayer.
tr_translation: Cause and effect: He had survived despite the enemy forces. Now, he felt he was on the brink of deep self-awareness... Surely, the magic of prayer had a part in this. T. K.
es_translation: Cause and effect: he lived in defiance of the malignant forces, and he realized that he was approaching a new perception that could not have taken place without the magic of the litany.

en: The first rock shingle, like a beach slanting from the sand, lay no more than ten meters ahead when they heard metal crunch and shatter behind them.
vi: Bãi đá đầu tiên, như một bãi biển đâm xiên từ cát, chỉ còn cách họ không quá mười mét thì họ nghe thấy tiếng kim loại kêu răng rắc và vỡ vụn sau lưng.
tr: Kum denizindeki bir sahil gibi görünen ilk kayalığa en fazla on metre kalmışken, arkalarından metal çatırtıları ve kırılma sesleri geldi.
es: El primer promontorio rocoso, como una playa surgiendo de la arena, no estaba a más de diez metros de ellos cuando oyeron a sus espaldas un horrible crujido de metal despedazado.
vi_translation: The first rocky outcrop, like a beach jutting out from the sand, was no more than ten meters away from them when they heard the sound of metal creaking and shattering behind them.
tr_translation: When they were no more than ten meters away from the first rock formation that looked like a beach in a sea of sand, metal clattering and breaking sounds came from behind them.
es_translation: The first rocky promontory, like a beach emerging from the sand, was no more than ten meters away from them when they heard a horrible crunch of torn metal behind them.

en: Again, the thing turned out away from the rocks, sped now with a curbing track toward the horizon. They listened until the sound of its passage was lost in gentle sand stirrings around them.
vi: Một lần nữa, con vật quay mình rời khỏi những tảng đá, giờ thì nó tăng tốc lao về phía chân trời, vẽ thành một đường vòng cung. Họ lắng nghe cho đến khi tiếng di chuyển của nó khuất hẳn trong âm thanh xao động của cát xung quanh họ.
tr: Yaratık tekrar kayalıktan uzaklaşıp ufka doğru, kıvrıla kıvrıla, giderek artan bir hızla gitmeye başladı. Çıkardığı sese, etraflarından gelen hafif kum hışırtılarından ayırt edilemez olana dek kulak kabarttılar.
es: La cosa se alejó nuevamente de las rocas, describiendo una gran curva hacia el horizonte. Permanecieron escuchando hasta que el rumor de su paso se confundió con el leve roce de la arena a su alrededor.
vi_translation: Once again, the animal turned away from the rocks, now accelerating towards the horizon, tracing an arc. They listened until the sound of its movement was completely drowned out by the rustling of the sand around them.
tr_translation: The creature started moving away from the cliff again, towards the horizon, winding and twisting, with increasing speed. They listened intently to the sound it made until it became indistinguishable from the faint rustling of sand around them.
es_translation: The thing moved away from the rocks again, describing a large curve towards the horizon. They remained listening until the sound of its passage blended with the gentle rustle of the sand around them.

en: They slid down onto a wide shelf that led around a sheer rock face. Again, they fell into the disjointed rhythm of movement across this broken land.
vi: Họ trượt xuống một thềm đá rộng bao quanh một mặt đá dốc đứng. Lại một lần nữa, họ rơi vào nhịp điệu chuyển động rời rạc qua vùng đất gập ghềnh này.
tr: Sarp bir kayalığın etrafından dolanan geniş bir kaya çıkıntısına atladılar. Bu engebeli bölgenin ahenksiz ritmine bir kez daha kapılmışlardı.
es: Surgieron a una amplia plataforma que costeaba, rodeándola, una pared rocosa cortada a pico. Siguieron avanzando al ritmo que les imponía aquel accidentado terreno.
vi_translation: They slid down a wide stone ledge surrounding a vertical rock face. Once again, they fell into a rhythm of disjointed movements across this rugged terrain.
tr_translation: They jumped onto a wide rock ledge that circled around a steep cliff. Once again, they were caught up in the discordant rhythm of this rugged area.
es_translation: They emerged onto a wide platform that skirted, encircling it, a sheer rock wall. They continued advancing at the pace imposed by that rugged terrain.

en: There came the sound of sand sliding behind him. He tried to see up the slope in the darkness, was almost knocked over by the cascade. It trailed away to silence.
vi: Có âm thanh cát trượt đằng sau cậu. Cậu cố gắng nhìn lên con dốc trong bóng tối hun hút, gần như bị dòng thác cát quật ngã xuống. Âm thanh cát trượt nhỏ dần rồi im lặng.
tr: Paul’ün arkasından akan kumların sesi geldi. Karanlıkta başını kaldırıp bayırın yukarısına bakmaya çalıştı, ama yukarıdan akan kumlar onu neredeyse devirecekti. Kum akışı bir süre sonra kesildi.
es: Entonces oyó el ruido de la arena deslizándose tras él. Se volvió, intentó mirar hacia arriba de la pendiente en la oscuridad, y fue embestido por una avalancha de arena. Luego, de nuevo el silencio.
vi_translation: There was the sound of sliding sand behind him. He tried to look up the slope in the pitch darkness, almost being knocked down by the cascade of sand. The sound of sliding sand gradually faded and then went silent.
tr_translation: The sound of sands flowing behind Paul was heard. He tried to lift his head and look up the hill in the darkness, but the sands flowing from above almost toppled him. The flow of sand stopped after a while.
es_translation: Then he heard the sound of sand sliding behind him. He turned, tried to look up the slope in the darkness, and was hit by an avalanche of sand. Then, silence again.

en: He dropped the pack, hurled himself up the slope, scrambling, digging, throwing sand like a wild man. “Mother!” he gasped. “Mother, where are you?”
vi: Cậu bỏ ba lô ra, lao lên con dốc, cậu bò, đào bới, ném cát giống như người điên. “Mẹ!” cậu thở hổn hển. “Mẹ ơi, mẹ ở đâu?”
tr: Paul çantasını bırakıp bayıra tırmanmaya başladı; delirmiş gibiydi. Soluk soluğa, “Anne!” diye bağırdı. “Anne, neredesin?
es: —¿Madre? Dejó la mochila y trepó por la pendiente, arañando, escarbando, apartando la arena con sus manos como un animal enloquecido. —¡Madre! —gritó—. Madre, ¿dónde estás?
vi_translation: You dropped your backpack, rushed up the slope, you crawled, dug, and threw sand like a madman. "Mom!" you gasped. "Mom, where are you?"
tr_translation: Paul dropped his bag and started climbing the hill; he seemed frantic. Out of breath, he shouted, "Mom!" "Mom, where are you?"
es_translation: He left the backpack and climbed up the slope, scratching, digging, pushing the sand aside with his hands like a crazed animal. —Mother! —he shouted—. Mother, where are you?

en: “Spice,” he said. “Its essence—highly alkaline. And I have the paracompass. Its power pack is acid-base.”
vi: “Hương dược,” cậu nói. “Nó có tính kiềm cao. Con có cận la bàn. Túi năng lượng của nó chứa a xít-ba zơ.”
tr: “Baharat,” dedi. “Özü yüksek oranda alkaliktir. Parapusulam da var. Pili asitle çalışıyor.
es: —Especia —dijo—. Su esencia es altamente alcalina. Y tengo aún el paracompás. Su pila de energía contiene ácido.
vi_translation: “Herbal medicine,” he said. “It has high alkalinity. You have a compass. Its energy pouch contains acid-base.”
tr_translation: “Spice,” he said. “Its essence is highly alkaline. I also have a parapusulam. Its battery operates on acid.”
es_translation: —Spice —he said—. Its essence is highly alkaline. And I still have the paracompás. Its energy cell contains acid.

en: Jessica’s eyes caught motion above them. She looked up to see a line of hawks along the rim of the fissure. They perched there staring down at the open water.
vi: Mắt Jessica hút vào chuyển động bên trên họ. Nàng ngước lên, thấy một đàn chim ưng đậu dọc theo mép khe nứt. Chúng đậu trên đó, nhìn chằm chằm vào chỗ nước để ngỏ.
tr: Jessica tepelerinde bir şeylerin hareket ettiğini fark etti. Yukarı bakınca, yarığın kenarına yan yana tünemiş şahinler gördü. Gözlerini aşağıya, suya dikmiş bakıyorlardı.
es: Los ojos de Jessica captaron un movimiento sobre ellos. Miró hacia arriba y vio una hilera de halcones perchados en lo alto de la fisura. Miraban fijamente al agua.
vi_translation: Jessica's eyes were drawn to the movement above them. She looked up and saw a flock of hawks perched along the edge of the crevice. They perched there, staring intently at the exposed water.
tr_translation: Jessica noticed something moving on the hills. When she looked up, she saw hawks perched side by side on the edge of the crevice. They were looking down, staring at the water.
es_translation: Jessica's eyes caught a movement above them. She looked up and saw a row of hawks perched high on the fissure. They were staring intently at the water.

en: “This is pretty far south into the desert,” he said. He lowered his binoculars, rubbed beneath his filter baffle, feeling how dry and chapped his lips were, sensing the dusty taste of thirst in his mouth. “This has the feeling of a Fremen place,” he said.
vi: “Nơi đó nằm khá xa về hướng Nam trong sa mạc,” cậu nói. Cậu hạ thấp ống nhòm xuống, xoa xoa vào chỗ dưới vách ngăn bộ lọc, cảm thấy môi mình mới khô và nứt nẻ làm sao, cảm thấy vị khô của cơn khát trong miệng. “Con có cảm giác đó là nơi ở của người Fremen,” cậu nói.
tr: “Sanmam... fazla güneydeyiz,” dedi Paul. Dürbününü indirip burnunun kenarını ovuşturdu; dudakları kupkuru ve çatlamıştı... ağzında toz tadı vardı ve susamıştı. “Bence civarda bir Fremen yerleşim merkezi var,” dedi.
es: —Estamos muy lejos hacia el sur, en pleno desierto —dijo él. Bajó los binoculares, rascándose bajo su filtro, notando sus labios secos y cortados y sintiendo en su boca el gusto del polvo y de la sed—. Parece un lugar Fremen —dijo.
vi_translation: "That place is quite far to the south in the desert," he said. He lowered the binoculars, rubbed the spot under the filter partition, feeling how dry and chapped his lips were, feeling the dry taste of thirst in his mouth. "I have a feeling that is the dwelling place of the Fremen," he said.
tr_translation: “We are too far south...” said Paul. He lowered his binoculars and rubbed the side of his nose; his lips were dry and cracked... there was a taste of dust in his mouth and he was thirsty. “I think there is a Fremen settlement nearby,” he said.
es_translation: —We are very far to the south, in the middle of the desert —he said. He lowered the binoculars, scratching under his filter, noticing his dry and cracked lips and feeling the taste of dust and thirst in his mouth—. —It looks like a Fremen place —he said.

en: A spill of sand spread its brief curtain across the open end of the fissure. The sand hissed down, loosed by puffs of morning breeze, by the hawks that were beginning to lift away from the clifftop. When the sand-fall was gone, she still heard it hissing. It grew louder, a sound that once heard, was never forgotten.
vi: Cát tràn ra, giăng một tấm màn ngắn chắn ngang đầu thông ra ngoài của khe nứt. Cát trở nên bở ra nhờ làn gió nhẹ buổi sáng, bởi những con chim ưng bắt đầu bay khỏi đỉnh vách núi, liền tuôn xì xì xuống dưới. Khi dòng thác cát đã qua đi, nàng vẫn còn nghe thấy tiếng xì xì của nó. Tiếng kêu ngày càng to hơn, cái âm thanh chỉ cần nghe một lần sẽ không bao giờ quên.
tr: Yarığın ucundan aşağı biraz kum, hışırdayarak döküldü. Kumu harekete geçiren, sabah esintisi ve havalanmaya başlayan şahinlerdi. Ama hışırtı, kum akışı durduktan sonra da devam etti. Giderek yükseldi, insanın hayatı boyunca unutamayacağı bir sesti.
es: Por un instante, una lluvia de arena formó una impalpable cortina al extremo de la fisura. La arena chirriaba por todas partes, esparcida por la brisa matutina, por los halcones que empezaron a alzar el vuelo en la cima del farallón. Cuando se hubo depositado, le pareció seguir oyendo su silbido. Era cada vez más intenso, un sonido que, una vez oído, ya no se podía olvidar.
vi_translation: Sand spilled out, forming a short curtain blocking the entrance of the crack. The sand became loose thanks to the gentle morning breeze, and as the falcons began to fly off the cliff tops, it hissed down below. When the sand waterfall had passed, she could still hear its hissing sound. The sound grew louder, a noise that once heard, would never be forgotten.
tr_translation: A bit of sand trickled down from the edge of the crevice, rustling as it fell. What set the sand in motion were the morning breeze and the hawks starting to soar. But the rustling continued even after the sand flow had stopped. It grew louder, a sound one could never forget in a lifetime.
es_translation: For an instant, a rain of sand formed an impalpable curtain at the edge of the fissure. The sand squeaked everywhere, scattered by the morning breeze, by the falcons that began to take flight at the top of the cliff. When it had settled, it seemed to him that he could still hear its whistle. It was increasingly intense, a sound that, once heard, could never be forgotten.

en: “Perhaps. And if so, I’ll give you my father’s answer to those who act without thinking: ‘A stone is heavy and the sand is weighty; but a fool’s wrath is heavier than them both.’ ”
vi: “Có thể. Và nếu đúng như vậy, tôi sẽ cho ông biết câu trả lời của cha tôi dành cho những người hành động mà không suy nghĩ: ‘Đá nặng và cát cũng nặng; nhưng sự phẫn nộ của một kẻ ngu ngốc thì còn nặng hơn cả đá và cát.’
tr: “Olabilir. Babamın düşüncesizce hareket eden insanlar için söylediği bir söz vardı: ‘Taş da ağırdır, kum da; ama budalanın gazabı ikisinden de ağırdır,’ derdi.
es: —Quizá. Y si es así, te daré la misma respuesta que daba mi padre a aquellos que actuaban sin pensar: «Pesada es la piedra y densa la arena; pero no son nada al lado de la furia de un idiota.»
vi_translation: “Maybe. And if that's the case, I will tell you my father's response to those who act without thinking: ‘Stone is heavy and sand is heavy; but the wrath of a fool is heavier than stone and sand.’ ”
tr_translation: “It is possible. My father had a saying for people who act thoughtlessly: 'A stone is heavy, and sand too; but the wrath of a fool is heavier than both,' he used to say.”
es_translation: —Maybe. And if that's the case, I'll give you the same answer my father gave to those who acted without thinking: "Heavy is the stone and dense is the sand; but they are nothing compared to the fury of an idiot."

en: Something fell soundlessly past their eyes into the mice. There came a thin screech, a flapping of wings, and a ghostly gray bird lifted away across the basin with a small, dark shadow in its talons.
vi: Có một cái gì đó lặng lẽ lướt qua mắt họ mà rơi vào giữa lũ chuột. Rồi vang lên tiếng rít yếu ớt, tiếng vỗ cánh, và một con chim màu xám trông như bóng ma bay vụt lên ngang qua vùng lòng chảo, móng vuốt quắp một cái bóng nhỏ, tối đen.
tr: Paul ile Jessica’nın önünden sessizce geçen bir şey, farelerin üstüne hızla süzüldü. Hafif bir cıyaklama ve kanat sesleri duyuldu. Hayalete benzeyen gri bir kuş, pençelerinde küçük, kara bir gölge taşıyarak havzanın üstünde yükselip uzaklaştı.
es: Algo se abatió fulmínea y silenciosamente sobre los ratones. Se oyó un leve chillido, un batir de alas, y un pájaro gris y fantasmagórico atravesó volando la depresión con una sombra pequeña y oscura entre sus garras.
vi_translation: Something quietly glided past their eyes and fell among the rats. Then came a faint screech, the sound of wings flapping, and a gray bird, looking like a ghost, swiftly flew across the basin, its claws clutching a small, dark shadow.
tr_translation: Something silently passed in front of Paul and Jessica, swiftly gliding over the mice. A faint squeak and the sound of wings were heard. A ghost-like gray bird, carrying a small, dark shadow in its claws, rose above the basin and flew away.
es_translation: Something struck down swiftly and silently upon the mice. A faint squeak was heard, a flapping of wings, and a gray, ghostly bird flew across the depression with a small, dark shadow in its claws.

en: Another voice called from the basin’s rim to their left. “Make it quick, Stil. Get their water and let’s be on our way. We’ve little enough time before dawn.”
vi: Một giọng nói khác phát ra từ mép vùng lòng chảo phía bên trái họ. “Làm nhanh lên, Stil. Lấy nước của bọn họ rồi đi thôi. Chúng ta chỉ còn chút ít thời gian trước khi trời hửng sáng.
tr: Havzanın sol kenarından bir başkası konuştu: “Elini çabuk tut Stil. Sularını al da yola devam edelim. Şafağa çok az kaldı.
es: Otra voz llamó desde el borde de la depresión, a su izquierda: —Apresúrate, Stil. Toma su agua y sigamos nuestro camino. Tenemos poco tiempo hasta el alba.
vi_translation: A different voice came from the edge of the basin on their left. "Hurry up, Stil. Take their water and let's go. We only have a little time before dawn breaks."
tr_translation: Someone from the left edge of the basin spoke: "Hurry up Stil. Get your water so we can continue on our way. Dawn is very near."
es_translation: Another voice called from the edge of the depression, to his left: —Hurry up, Stil. Take his water and let's continue on our way. We have little time until dawn.

en: “You will die, too,” his father said, “if you don’t get off the bubble that’s forming right now deep underneath you. It’s there and you know it. You can smell the pre-spice gasses. You know the little makers are beginning to lose some of their water into the mass.”
vi: “Con cũng sẽ chết,” cha ông nói, “nếu con không thoát ra khỏi cái bong bóng ngay lúc này đang hình thành sâu bên dưới con. Nó nằm ở đó và con biết nó. Con có thể ngửi thấy những luồng khí tiền hương dược. Con biết những Ngài tạo bé đang bắt đầu để mất chút nước của các ngài vào khối quặng đó.”
tr: “Şu an tam altında, çok derinlerde oluşan gaz kütlesinden uzaklaşmazsan sen de öleceksin,” dedi babası. “Orada olduğunu biliyorsun. Ham baharat gazlarının kokusunu alıyorsun. Küçük yaradanların sularının bir kısmını o baharat kütlesine salmaya başladığını biliyorsun.
es: —Realmente vas a morir —dijo su padre— si no te apartas de esa burbuja de gas que se está formando debajo de ti. Y esto lo sabes bien. Puedes oler los gases de la preespecia. Sabes que los pequeños hacedores están perdiendo un poco de su agua en la masa.
vi_translation: “You will also die,” his father said, “if you do not escape from the bubble that is forming right now deep beneath you. It lies there and you know it. You can smell the streams of pre-spice gas. You know the Little Makers are beginning to lose some of their water into that mass.”
tr_translation: “If you don't move away from the mass of gas forming right now, deep underneath, you will die too,” said his father. “You know it's there. You can smell the raw spice gases. You know that some of the waters of the small wounds have started to release into that spice mass.”
es_translation: —You are really going to die —said his father— if you don't move away from that gas bubble forming beneath you. And you know this well. You can smell the pre-spice gases. You know that the little makers are losing some of their water in the mass.

en: The thought of that water beneath him was maddening. He imagined it now—sealed off in strata of porous rock by the leathery half-plant, half-animal little makers—and the thin rupture that was pouring a cool stream of clearest, pure, liquid, soothing water into….
vi: Cái ý nghĩ rằng bên dưới ông có nước khiến ông muốn điên lên. Bây giờ ông tưởng tượng ra nó - bị giam kín trong các vỉa đá rỗ ong bởi những Ngài tạo bé nửa cây nửa thú thô kệch - và cái lỗ thủng mỏng manh đang phun một dòng nước cực kỳ trong trẻo, tinh khiết, lỏng, thật là dịu ngọt vào...
tr: Altında su olduğunu düşünmek çıldırtıcıydı. Kynes suyu hayal edebiliyordu... kayışımsı, yarı-bitki yarı-hayvan küçük yaradanlar tarafından gözenekli kaya katmanlarına salgılanıyordu... ince yarıklardan en temiz, en saf, ferahlatıcı sular akıyordu...
es: El pensamiento de aquella agua debajo de él le enloqueció. Se la imaginó... bloqueada en los estratos de roca porosa por aquellos seres coriáceos, mitad plantas, mitad animales, los pequeños hacedores... y la sutil ruptura donde se vertía un líquido claro, puro, refrescante en la...
vi_translation: The thought that there was water beneath him drove him mad. Now he imagined it - trapped within the porous rock layers by those crude half-plant, half-animal beings - and the fragile hole spurting an extremely clear, pure, liquid stream, so sweet and gentle into...
tr_translation: The thought of water underneath was maddening. Kynes could imagine the water... secreted into the porous rock layers by leathery, semi-plant semi-animal little creatures... the cleanest, purest, most refreshing waters flowing from thin cracks...
es_translation: The thought of that water beneath him drove him mad. He imagined it... trapped in the porous rock layers by those leathery beings, half plants, half animals, the little makers... and the subtle break where a clear, pure, refreshing liquid poured into the...

en: He could feel frustration sapping what little strength remained to him. Water so near—only a hundred meters or so beneath him; a worm sure to come, but no way to trap it on the surface and use it.
vi: Ông có thể cảm thấy nỗi thất vọng đang làm cạn dần chút sức lực nhỏ nhoi còn lại trong mình. Nước ở gần đây thôi - chỉ khoảng một trăm mét bên dưới ông; một con sâu cát chắc chắn sẽ đến, nhưng chẳng có cách nào bẫy được nó trên bề mặt và sử dụng nó.
tr: Acizlikten kaynaklanan öfkesi, zaten azalmış gücünü iyice tüketiyordu. Çok yakınında... yalnızca yüz metre kadar altında su vardı; bir solucanın geleceği de kesindi, ama Kynes’ın onu yüzeyde yakalayıp kullanma olanağı yoktu.
es: La frustración minó los restos de energía que quedaban en él. El agua estaba muy cerca... sólo a unos cien metros debajo; seguramente aparecería un gusano, pero no disponía de ningún medio para atraparlo en la superficie y usarlo.
vi_translation: He could feel the frustration draining the last bit of strength he had left. The water was nearby - only about a hundred meters below him; a sandworm would surely come, but there was no way to trap it on the surface and use it.
tr_translation: His anger, stemming from helplessness, was further depleting his already diminished strength. Very close by... there was water just about a hundred meters below; the arrival of a worm was certain, but Kynes had no opportunity to catch and use it on the surface.
es_translation: Frustration sapped the remaining energy he had left. The water was very close... only about a hundred meters below; surely a worm would appear, but he had no means to catch it on the surface and use it.

en: “Religion and law among our masses must be one and the same,” his father said. “An act of disobedience must be a sin and require religious penalties. This will have the dual benefit of bringing both greater obedience and greater bravery. We must depend not so much on the bravery of individuals, you see, as upon the bravery of a whole population.”
vi: “Tôn giáo và luật pháp giữa đám dân của chúng ta phải là một và giống như nhau,” cha ông nói. “Mỗi hành động bất tuân phải là một tội lỗi và cần đến những hình phạt tôn giáo. Điều này sẽ có một lợi ích kép: họ vừa tuân lệnh hơn vừa dũng cảm hơn. Chúng ta không được trông cậy quá nhiều vào lòng dũng cảm của từng cá nhân, con biết đấy, mà nên trông cậy vào lòng dũng cảm của toàn bộ dân chúng.”
tr: “Kitlelerimizin din ve hukuku bir ve aynı olmalı,” dedi babası. “İtaatsizlik günah sayılmalı, cezası dinsel olmalı. Böylece halk hem bize daha çok inanır, hem de daha cesur olur. Anlarsın ya, bizim için önemli olan bireylerin cesaretinden çok halkın cesareti.
es: —Religión y ley deben ser una única cosa para las masas —dijo su padre—. Un acto de desobediencia debe constituir un pecado sancionado por castigos religiosos. Esto tendrá el doble beneficio de obtener una mayor obediencia y una mayor valentía. No debemos depender del valor individual, piénsalo bien, sino de la valentía de todo un pueblo.
vi_translation: “Religion and law among our people must be one and the same,” his father said. “Every act of disobedience must be a sin and require religious penalties. This will have a dual benefit: they will be both more obedient and more courageous. We must not rely too much on the courage of individuals, you know, but rather on the courage of the entire populace.”
tr_translation: “The religion and law of our masses should be one and the same,” said his father. “Disobedience should be considered a sin, and its punishment should be religious. In this way, the people will both believe in us more and become braver. You understand, what is important for us is the courage of the people rather than the courage of individuals.”
es_translation: —Religion and law must be one and the same for the masses —said his father—. An act of disobedience must constitute a sin sanctioned by religious punishments. This will have the dual benefit of obtaining greater obedience and greater bravery. We must not rely on individual valor, think about it well, but on the bravery of an entire people.

en: As she looked at the dawn-gray basin, the sun lifted over the far escarpment illuminating a biscuit-colored landscape of rocks and sand. And she noted how the sun of Arrakis appeared to leap over the horizon.
vi: Trong khi nàng nhìn vùng lòng chảo màu xám dưới ánh rạng đông, mặt trời nhô lên trên vách núi xa xa chiếu sáng cả một vùng đá và cát màu nâu nhạt. Và nàng để ý thấy mặt trời Arrakis dường như nhảy thoắt qua đường chân trời.
tr: Jessica şafak aydınlığında gri görünen havzaya bakarken, güneş uzaktaki kayalıkların ardından yükselince, taşlı ve kumlu havza birden bisküvi rengine dönüştü. Jessica, Arrakis güneşinin ufuktan bir anda, sıçrarcasına yükseliverdiğine dikkat etti.
es: Mientras contemplaba la depresión a la grisácea luz del alba, el sol surgió por encima de la lejana escarpadura, iluminando un paisaje de rocas y arena color terracota. Y notó como el sol de Arrakis surgía tan rápidamente que parecía saltar sobre el horizonte.
vi_translation: While she looked at the gray basin under the dawn light, the sun rose above the distant cliff, illuminating an entire area of light brown rock and sand. And she noticed that the sun of Arrakis seemed to leap quickly across the horizon.
tr_translation: As Jessica looked at the basin that appeared gray in the dawn light, the sun rose from behind the distant rocks, and the stony and sandy basin suddenly turned biscuit-colored. Jessica noticed that the Arrakis sun rose from the horizon in an instant, almost as if it had leaped.
es_translation: As he gazed at the depression in the grayish dawn light, the sun rose above the distant escarpment, illuminating a landscape of terracotta-colored rocks and sand. And he noticed how the sun of Arrakis rose so quickly that it seemed to jump over the horizon.

en: She returned his stare, noted the whiteless eyes, the stained eyepits, the dust-rimmed beard and mustache, the line of the catchtube curving down from his nostrils into his stillsuit.
vi: Nàng đáp trả cái nhìn chằm chằm của ông, để ý thấy đôi mắt không có chút màu trắng, hai hốc mắt biến màu, râu ria đầy bụi viền quanh, đường dây của ống hứng nối từ lỗ mũi vòng xuống bộ sa phục.
tr: Jessica, Stilgar’ın bakışına karşılık verdi; adamın aksız gözlerine, lekeli göz çukurlarına, tozlu sakalına ve bıyığına, burun deliklerinden aşağı kıvrılarak inip damıtıcı-giysisinin içinde gözden kaybolan toplayıcı-tüpüne baktı.
es: Jessica sostuvo su mirada, notando sus ojos desprovistos de blanco, los párpados manchados, la barba y el bigote llenos de polvo, el tubo fijado a su nariz y que se hundía en el destiltraje.
vi_translation: She returned his stare, noticing the eyes devoid of any white, the discolored eye sockets, the dusty beard framing his face, and the tubing running from his nostrils down to his robe.
tr_translation: Jessica met Stilgar's gaze; she looked into the man's eyeless sockets, his stained eye cavities, his dusty beard and mustache, and the collector tube that curved down from his nostrils and disappeared into his stillsuit.
es_translation: Jessica held his gaze, noticing his eyes devoid of white, the stained eyelids, the beard and mustache full of dust, the tube fixed to his nose and sinking into the stillsuit.

en: His words, the depth of their awareness, the fact that he spoke as much to her as to those who secretly listened, forced her to reevaluate him.
vi: Những lời ông nói, chiều sâu ý thức của chúng, cái thực tế rằng ông nói nhiều như thế với nàng cũng là để nói với những kẻ đang bí mật lắng nghe, những điều đó buộc nàng phải đánh giá lại ông.
tr: Stilgar’ın söyledikleri, sözlerindeki derinlik, bunları Jessica’ya olduğu kadar gizlice dinleyen adamlara da söylüyor olması, Jessica’yı onun hakkındaki kanısını değiştirmeye zorladı.
es: Sus palabras, la profundidad de su consciencia, el hecho de que hablara tanto para ella como para los que escuchaban secretamente, obligaron a Jessica a revaluarle.
vi_translation: The words he spoke, the depth of their meaning, the fact that he said so much to her also to speak to those secretly listening, all these things forced her to reassess him.
tr_translation: The things Stilgar said, the depth of his words, the fact that he was saying them not only to Jessica but also to the men secretly listening, forced Jessica to change her opinion about him.
es_translation: His words, the depth of his consciousness, the fact that he spoke both for her and for those who listened secretly, forced Jessica to reevaluate him.

en: She could still taste their morning meal—the morsel of bird flesh and grain bound within a leaf with spice honey—and it came to her that the use of time was turned around here: night was the day of activity and day was the time of rest.
vi: Nàng vẫn ngửi thấy mùi bữa sáng - những mẩu thịt chim và hạt bọc trong lá, cho thêm mật hương dược - và chợt nghĩ ra rằng ở đây cách sử dụng thời gian đã được hoán đổi: đêm thì sinh hoạt, ngày thì nghỉ.
tr: Kahvaltının; baharat balıyla yoğrulmuş kuş etli ve arpalı yaprak sarmanın tadı hâlâ damağındaydı, burada insanların gündüzleri uyuyup geceleri faal olduklarını fark etti.
es: Tenían aún en la boca el sabor de su comida de la mañana: la carne de pájaro con cereal amasado con miel de especia —todo ello enrollado en una hoja—, y se dio cuenta de que el tiempo allí estaba invertido: la noche era el día de actividad y el día el tiempo de reposo.
vi_translation: She could still smell the breakfast - pieces of bird meat and seeds wrapped in leaves, with added medicinal honey - and suddenly realized that here, the use of time had been reversed: night was for activities, day was for rest.
tr_translation: The taste of the breakfast, with bird meat and barley leaf wraps kneaded with spiced honey, was still on his palate, and he realized that people here slept during the day and were active at night.
es_translation: They still had the taste of their morning meal in their mouths: bird meat with cereal kneaded with spiced honey —all wrapped in a leaf—, and they realized that time there was inverted: night was the time of activity and day the time of rest.

en: Windtrap! she thought. They’ve a concealed windtrap somewhere on the surface to funnel air down here into cooler regions and precipitate the moisture from it.
vi: Bẫy gió! nàng nghĩ. Họ có một cái bẫy gió giấu ở đâu đó trên mặt đất để lùa không khí xuống đây, đến những chỗ mát hơn, nhằm thu hơi ẩm trong không khí.
tr: Rüzgârkapanı! diye düşündü. Yüzeyde bir yere bir rüzgârkapanı gizlemişler; böylece havayı daha soğuk olan bu aşağı kısımlara getirip, içindeki nemin ayrışmasını sağlıyorlar.
es: ¡Una trampa de viento!, pensó. Han escondido una trampa de viento en algún lugar de la superficie, de modo que el aire llega hasta estas regiones más frías donde se precipita la humedad que hay en él.
vi_translation: Wind trap! she thought. They have a wind trap hidden somewhere on the surface to channel air down here, to the cooler places, in order to collect moisture from the air.
tr_translation: Windtrap! he thought. They have hidden a windtrap somewhere on the surface; this way, they bring the air down to these cooler lower parts, causing the moisture within it to separate.
es_translation: A wind trap!, he thought. They have hidden a wind trap somewhere on the surface, so that the air reaches these colder regions where the moisture in it precipitates.

en: The adjustment of his body shield took only a moment, and he paused to sense the skin-tightening at his forehead assuring him he was properly guarded.
vi: Việc điều chỉnh tấm chắn bảo vệ cơ thể chỉ mất chút thời gian, và cậu ngừng lại để lĩnh hội cảm giác thít chặt vào trán, khiến cậu yên tâm rằng mình đã được bảo vệ đâu ra đó.
tr: Vücut kalkanını ayarlaması bir saniye sürdü; kalkanın düzgün çalışıp çalışmadığını anlamak için öylece durup alın derisinin gerilmesini bekledi.
es: Necesitó tan sólo un instante para regular su escudo corporal e hizo una breve pausa para sentir la tensión en la piel de su frente que le garantizaba una perfecta defensa.
vi_translation: Adjusting the body armor shield took only a little time, and he paused to take in the sensation of it tightening around his forehead, reassuring him that he was well protected.
tr_translation: It took a second to adjust the body shield; he stood still to feel the tightening of his forehead skin to check if the shield was working properly.
es_translation: He needed only an instant to adjust his body shield and took a brief pause to feel the tension on the skin of his forehead, which guaranteed him perfect defense.

en: A tight smile crossed Feyd-Rautha’s mouth. He lifted the barbs, seeing success for his plans in the way the gladiator stood.
vi: Một nụ cười mím chặt vắt chéo qua môi Feyd-Rautha. Cậu nâng hai thanh giáo lên, nhìn thấy những kế hoạch của cậu sẽ thành công qua cách đứng của tên đấu sĩ.
tr: Feyd-Rautha hafifçe gülümsedi. Kancalı mızrakları havaya kaldırırken kölenin duruşuna baktı ve onu yenebileceğini düşündü.
es: Una furtiva sonrisa cruzó la boca de Feyd-Rautha. Alzó las picas, viendo el éxito de sus planes en la forma en que el gladiador permanecía de pie.
vi_translation: A tight-lipped smile crossed Feyd-Rautha's lips. He raised the two spears, seeing that his plans would succeed through the stance of the gladiator.
tr_translation: Feyd-Rautha smiled slightly. He looked at the slave's stance as he raised the hooked spears into the air and thought he could defeat him.
es_translation: A furtive smile crossed Feyd-Rautha's lips. He raised the pikes, seeing the success of his plans in the way the gladiator stood.

en: He saw his handlers approaching with a saw-knife to do the honors, waved them back, repeated the gesture as they hesitated. They think they honor me with just a head! he thought. He bent and crossed the gladiator’s hands around the protruding knife handle, then removed the knife and placed it in the limp hands.
vi: Cậu thấy các trợ thủ tiến tới, tay cầm một con dao như kiểu chiếc cưa để làm nhiệm vụ của mình, liền vẫy tay ra hiệu họ lùi lại, vẫy tay lần nữa khi thấy họ do dự. Họ nghĩ chỉ một cái đầu là đủ tôn vinh ta rồi đấy! cậu nghĩ. Cậu cúi xuống, xếp hai tay tên đấu sĩ bắt tréo quanh cán dao thòi ra, rồi rút dao đặt vào trong hai bàn tay bất động.
tr: Yardımcılarının testere getirdiğini görünce, elini sallayarak gitmelerini işaret etti. Bocaladıklarını görünce de aynı hareketi tekrarladı. Beni altı üstü bir kelleyle onurlandırabileceklerini sanıyorlar! diye düşündü. Cesedin üstüne eğilip, gladyatörün ellerini göğsündeki bıçağın sapının etrafına yerleştirdi... sonra da bıçağı çıkarıp, cansız ellerin arasına koydu.
es: Vio a sus manipuladores acercarse, con el cuchillo-sierra para los honores; les detuvo con un gesto imperativo, repitiendo el gesto al ver que dudaban. ¡Crees honrarme con una cabeza!, pensó. Se inclinó y cruzó las manos del gladiador en torno a la empuñadura del cuchillo que surgía de su pecho, luego extrajo el cuchillo y lo situó entre las inertes manos.
vi_translation: He saw the assistants approaching, holding a saw-like knife to perform their task, and immediately waved them back, waving again when he saw their hesitation. They think just one head is enough to honor me! he thought. He bent down, crossed the gladiator's hands around the protruding knife handle, then pulled the knife out and placed it into the motionless hands.
tr_translation: Upon seeing his assistants bring a saw, he waved his hand to signal them to leave. When he saw their hesitation, he repeated the same gesture. They think they can honor me with a mere head! he thought. He leaned over the corpse and placed the gladiator's hands around the hilt of the knife on his chest... then removed the knife and placed it between the lifeless hands.
es_translation: He saw his handlers approaching, with the saw-knife for the honors; he stopped them with an imperative gesture, repeating the gesture when he saw them hesitate. You think you honor me with a head!, he thought. He bent down and crossed the gladiator's hands around the hilt of the knife protruding from his chest, then he extracted the knife and placed it between the lifeless hands.

en: It was done in an instant, and he straightened, beckoned his handlers. “Bury this slave intact with his knife in his hands,” he said. “The man earned it.”
vi: Việc đó cậu làm chỉ trong nháy mắt, rồi cậu thẳng người dậy, gật đầu ra hiệu cho các trợ thủ. “Chôn tên nô lệ này đi, cứ để nguyên con dao trong tay gã,” cậu nói. “Gã xứng đáng giành được nó.
tr: Bu işi bir saniyede halletmişti; doğrulup yardımcılarına seslendi. “Bu köleyi ellerinde bıçakla gömün,” dedi. “Bunu hak etti.
es: Le bastó un momento. Entonces se irguió; haciendo un signo a sus manipuladores. —Sepultad a este esclavo intacto, con su cuchillo entre las manos —dijo—. El hombre se lo ha merecido.
vi_translation: He did it in the blink of an eye, then straightened up and nodded to his assistants. "Bury this slave, leave the knife in his hand," he said. "He deserves to keep it."
tr_translation: He had taken care of this job in a second; he straightened up and called out to his assistants. “Bury this slave with a knife in his hands,” he said. “He deserved this.”
es_translation: It took him a moment. Then he stood up; making a sign to his handlers. —Bury this slave intact, with his knife in his hands —he said—. The man has earned it.

en: She turned, led the way down the passage, turning right into a wide cross tunnel lighted by evenly spaced yellow overhead globes. The stone floor was smooth, swept clean of sand.
vi: Chị ta quay đi, dẫn đường dọc theo hành lang, rẽ phải vào một đường hầm rộng rãi cắt ngang được những quả cầu màu vàng treo cách quãng đều đặn trên đầu chiếu sáng. Sàn đá phẳng lì, tịnh không một hạt bụi.
tr: Harah dönüp geçitte yürümeye başladı; sağdaki geniş bir tünele saptı... buranın tavanına düzenli aralıklarla sarı korküreler yerleştirilmişti. Taş zemini düz ve kumsuzdu... süpürüldüğü belliydi.
es: Ella se volvió, conduciéndole a lo largo de un corredor, girando a la derecha en un amplio túnel iluminado a intervalos regulares por globos que ponían reflejos amarillos a las rocas. El suelo de piedra era liso, sin el menor rastro de arena.
vi_translation: She turned away, leading the way along the corridor, turning right into a spacious tunnel intersected by evenly spaced yellow globes hanging overhead, illuminating the path. The stone floor was smooth and spotless, without a speck of dust.
tr_translation: Harah turned and began to walk in the passage; he turned into a wide tunnel on the right... yellow crystals were placed at regular intervals on the ceiling here. The stone floor was smooth and free of sand... it was evident that it had been swept.
es_translation: She turned, leading him along a corridor, turning right into a wide tunnel illuminated at regular intervals by globes that cast yellow reflections on the rocks. The stone floor was smooth, without the slightest trace of sand.

en: “You know better than that,” the inward image said. “Swiftly now, do not fight me. There isn’t much time. We….” There came a long pause, then: “You should’ve told us you were pregnant!”
vi: “Ngươi biết rõ mà,” hình ảnh nội tâm nói. “Ngay bây giờ, đừng đánh lại ta. Không có nhiều thời gian đâu. Chúng ta...” Có một quãng lặng dài, rồi: “Đáng lẽ ngươi phải bảo chúng ta rằng ngươi đang có thai!”
tr: İçindeki görüntü “Halüsinasyon görmediğini biliyorsun,” dedi. “Rahat ol; benimle savaşma. Fazla vaktimiz yok. Biz...” Birden sustu; uzun bir sessizliğin ardından “Hamile olduğunu bize söylemeliydin!” dedi.
es: —Tú sabes bien que no —dijo la imagen interior—. Debemos apresurarnos ahora, no luches conmigo. No hay mucho tiempo. Nosotras... —Una larga pausa, y luego—: ¿Por qué no nos has dicho que estabas encinta?
vi_translation: "You know it well," said the inner voice. "Right now, don't fight me. There isn't much time. We..." There was a long pause, then: "You should have told us that you are pregnant!"
tr_translation: The image inside said, “You know you are not hallucinating.” “Relax; don't fight me. We don't have much time. We...” Suddenly, it fell silent; after a long pause, it said, “You should have told us you were pregnant!”
es_translation: —You know very well that you don't —said the inner image—. We must hurry now, don't fight with me. There isn't much time. We... —A long pause, and then—: Why haven't you told us that you were pregnant?

en: This wasn’t exactly how they did it at the Bene Gesserit school, she knew. No one had ever introduced her to the mysteries of it, but she knew.
vi: Đây không hẳn là cách người ta đã làm ở trường Bene Gesserit, nàng biết. Chưa ai từng truyền dạy cho nàng những bí ẩn của nó, nhưng nàng biết.
tr: Bene Gesserit Okulu’nda bu iş daha farklı yapılırdı. Gerçi kimse ona işin sırrını anlatmamıştı, ama yine de bunu biliyordu.
es: No ocurría exactamente así en la escuela Bene Gesserit, pensó. Ahora lo sabía, aunque nadie la había introducido en aquellos misterios.
vi_translation: This is not exactly how people did it at the Bene Gesserit school, she knew. No one had ever taught her its secrets, but she knew.
tr_translation: At the Bene Gesserit School, this was done differently. Although no one had told her the secret of the task, she knew it nonetheless.
es_translation: It didn't happen exactly like that in the Bene Gesserit school, she thought. Now she knew, although no one had introduced her to those mysteries.

en: I did it, my poor, unformed, dear little daughter, I brought you into this universe and exposed your awareness to all its varieties without any defenses.
vi: Mẹ đã làm điều đó, con gái yêu dấu, bé bỏng tội nghiệp, chưa thành hình của mẹ, mẹ đã mang con vào vũ trụ này và phơi trần ý thức của con dưới tất cả sự phức tạp của vũ trụ mà không có gì bảo vệ.
tr: Bunu ben yaptım, benim zavallı, şekillenmemiş, minik, sevgili kızım... seni bu evrene ben getirdim ve kalkanlarını oluşturmana fırsat tanımadan, seni bu evrendeki çeşitli şeylere maruz bıraktım.
es: Lo he permitido, mi pobre, aún no formada y pequeña querida hija. Te he llevado a este universo y te he expuesto sin la menor defensa a la infinita variedad de sus conocimientos.
vi_translation: Mother did that, my beloved, poor little daughter, my unformed child, I brought you into this universe and exposed your consciousness to all the complexities of the universe without any protection.
tr_translation: I did this, my poor, unformed, little, dear daughter... I brought you into this universe and exposed you to various things in this universe without giving you the chance to form your shields.
es_translation: I have allowed it, my poor, still unformed and little dear daughter. I have brought you into this universe and exposed you without the slightest defense to the infinite variety of its knowledge.

en: “Let them have their orgy, ” the other-memory said within her. “They’ve little enough pleasure out of living. Yes, and you and I need this little time to become acquainted before I recede and pour out through your memories. Already, I feel myself being tied to bits of you. Ah-h-h, you’ve a mind filled with interesting things. So many things I’d never imagined.”
vi: “Cứ để họ mặc sức truy hoan,” cái ký-ức-khác kia nói bên trong nàng. “Họ được hưởng quá ít lạc thú từ cuộc sống. Phải, ta và ngươi cần chút ít thời gian này để quen dần trước khi ta rút lui và tuôn chảy thông qua các ký ức của ngươi. Hiện giờ ta đã cảm thấy ta đang bị gắn liền với nhiều mảnh của ngươi rồi. Ái chà chà, ngươi có một tâm trí đầy những điều thú vị. Quá nhiều điều mà ta chẳng bao giờ tưởng tượng ra.”
tr: İçindeki diğer bellek, “Bırak eğlensinler,” dedi. “Zaten hayattan aldıkları pek az zevk var. Bu arada biz de tanışma fırsatı bulabiliriz; daha sonra geri çekilecek, anılarına karışacağım. Ahhh, zihnin ilginç şeylerle dolu. Hayal bile etmediğim bir sürü şeyle dolu.
es: «Deja que ellos tengan su orgía», dijo la otra memoria dentro de ella. «Hay tan pocos placeres en la vida. Además, tú y yo necesitamos otro breve instante para conocernos, antes de que yo me disuelva completamente en tus recuerdos. Me siento ya obligada a muchos de ellos. Ahhh... tu mente está llena de cosas interesantes. Muchas más cosas de las que nunca hubieras imaginado.»
vi_translation: "Let them indulge in their revelry," that other memory said inside her. "They have too little pleasure in life. Yes, you and I need this little time to get accustomed before I withdraw and flow through your memories. Right now, I already feel that I am being connected to many parts of you. Oh my, you have a mind full of interesting things. So many things that I could never have imagined."
tr_translation: The other memory inside said, "Let them have fun." "They already have very little pleasure in life. In the meantime, we can have the opportunity to get acquainted; later, I will withdraw and blend into their memories. Ahhh, the mind is full of interesting things. Full of many things I never even imagined."
es_translation: “Let them have their orgy,” said the other memory within her. “There are so few pleasures in life. Besides, you and I need another brief moment to get to know each other, before I completely dissolve into your memories. I already feel obliged to many of them. Ahhh... your mind is full of interesting things. Many more things than you could have ever imagined.”

en: I’m like a person whose hands were kept numb, without sensation from the first moment of awareness—until one day the ability to feel is forced into them.
vi: Ta như một người mãi tê liệt đôi tay, không hề cảm thấy gì ngay từ khoảnh khắc đầu tiên ta biết nhận thức - cho đến một ngày kia người ta dồn ép cái khả năng cảm nhận đó vào trong chúng.
tr: Elleri doğuştan hissiz bir insan gibiyim... günün birinde onlara hissetme yetisi dayatıldı.
es: Soy como una persona cuyas manos han permanecido paralizadas, insensibles, durante toda su vida... hasta que un día vuelve a ellas su habilidad de moverse y percibir sensaciones.
vi_translation: I am like a person whose hands have been paralyzed forever, feeling nothing from the very first moment I became aware - until one day, someone forced the ability to feel into them.
tr_translation: I'm like a person whose hands are numb from birth... one day, the ability to feel was imposed on them.
es_translation: I am like a person whose hands have remained paralyzed, numb, throughout their entire life... until one day their ability to move and perceive sensations returns.

en: He held himself poised in the awareness, seeing time stretch out in its weird dimension, delicately balanced yet whirling, narrow yet spread like a net gathering countless worlds and forces, a tightwire that he must walk, yet a teeter-totter on which he balanced.
vi: Cậu giữ cho mình cân bằng trong nhận thức, nhìn thời gian trải dài ra trong kích thước khác thường của nó, cân bằng một cách tinh tế nhưng xoay tít, chật hẹp nhưng trải rộng như một tấm lưới thâu tóm vô số thế giới và vô số lực, một sợi dây căng mà cậu phải đi qua, nhưng cũng là một chiếc ván bập bênh mà trên đó cậu giữ được thăng bằng.
tr: Paul farkındalığının içinde öylece duruyordu... kendi tuhaf boyutunda göz alabildiğine uzanan zamanı seyrediyordu; çok hassas bir dengedeydi, ama dönüp duruyordu; dardı, ama sayısız dünyayı ve gücü toplayan bir ağ gibi dört bir yana uzanmıştı; üstünde yürümesi gereken gergin halat, aynı zamanda üstünde dengesini koruduğu bir tahterevalliydi.
es: El se inmovilizó en su consciencia, viendo al tiempo dilatarse en su extraña dimensión, delicadamente estable pero aún tumultuoso, estrecho y a la vez proyectado para recoger mundos y energías innumerables, una cuerda tensa y oscilante sobre la que debía pasar manteniendo el equilibrio.
vi_translation: You keep yourself balanced in perception, watching time stretch out in its unusual dimensions, delicately balanced yet spinning, narrow yet expansive like a net capturing countless worlds and countless forces, a tightrope you must walk, but also a seesaw on which you maintain your balance.
tr_translation: Paul was standing still within his awareness... he was watching time stretch out as far as the eye could see in its own peculiar dimension; he was in a very delicate balance, yet he was spinning; it was narrow, but it extended in all directions like a net gathering countless worlds and power; the tightrope he had to walk on was also a seesaw on which he maintained his balance.
es_translation: He immobilized himself in his consciousness, watching time dilate in its strange dimension, delicately stable yet still tumultuous, narrow and at the same time projected to gather innumerable worlds and energies, a tense and oscillating rope on which he had to pass while maintaining balance.

en: The drug had him again and he thought: So many times you’ve given me comfort and forgetfulness. He felt anew the hyperillumination with its high-relief imagery of time, sensed his future becoming memories—the tender indignities of physical love, the sharing and communion of selves, the softness and the violence.
vi: Thuốc lại chi phối cậu và cậu nghĩ: Quá nhiều lần em đã cho ta niềm an ủi và sự lãng quên. Cậu lại cảm thấy cảnh tượng thời gian được soi sáng quá tràn trề với những hình ảnh nổi rõ mồn một đó, cảm thấy những tương lai của mình trở thành ký ức - những sỉ nhục tinh tế của tình yêu xác thịt, sự chia sẻ và đồng cảm giữa những cái tôi, sự dịu dàng và sự dữ dội.
tr: Paul tekrar uyuşturucunun etkisi altına girmişti; Beni kim bilir kaç kez rahatlattın, yüreğime su serptin, unutmamı sağladın, diye düşündü. Zamanın tekrar parlaklaştığını, geleceğinin anılara dönüştüğünü hissetti... fiziksel aşkın şefkatli ve küçük düşürücü hareketlerini, benliklerin paylaşımını ve birleşimini, yumuşaklığı ve şiddeti hissetti.
es: La droga se apoderó nuevamente de él, y pensó: En tantas ocasiones me has dado tranquilidad y el olvido. De nuevo le aferró la hiperiluminación, con sus detalladas imágenes del tiempo, y sintió su futuro transformarse en recuerdos: las tiernas agresiones del amor físico, la comunión de identidades, la participación, la dulzura y la violencia.
vi_translation: The drug influences you again and you think: Too many times you have given me comfort and oblivion. You again feel the scene of time illuminated too abundantly with those vividly clear images, feeling your futures turning into memories - the subtle humiliations of carnal love, the sharing and empathy between selves, the tenderness and the intensity.
tr_translation: Paul was under the influence of drugs again; Who knows how many times you've comforted me, eased my heart, made me forget, he thought. He felt that time was brightening again, that his future was turning into memories... He felt the compassionate and humiliating movements of physical love, the sharing and merging of selves, the softness and the intensity.
es_translation: The drug took hold of him once again, and he thought: On so many occasions you have given me tranquility and oblivion. Once again hyperillumination gripped him, with its detailed images of time, and he felt his future transform into memories: the tender aggressions of physical love, the communion of identities, the participation, the sweetness and the violence.

en: She had quoted a Bene Gesserit proverb to him: “When religion and politics travel in the same cart, the riders believe nothing can stand in their way. Their movement become headlong—faster and faster and faster. They put aside all thought of obstacles and forget that a precipice does not show itself to the man in a blind rush until it’s too late.”
vi: Bà đã trích dẫn một châm ngôn Bene Gesserit cho chàng: “Khi tôn giáo và chính trị đi trên cùng một cỗ xe, những người ngồi trên xe tin rằng không gì có thể cản đường họ. Chuyển động của họ trở nên nhanh đến điên rồ; nhanh nữa, nhanh nữa, nhanh hơn nữa. Họ dẹp sang bên mọi ý nghĩ về trở ngại mà quên rằng vực thẳm chỉ bày ra trước mắt kẻ đang mù quáng lao vùn vụt khi đã quá muộn.
tr: Paul’e bir Bene Gesserit atasözünü söylemişti: “Din ile siyaset aynı arabada gittiğinde, sürücüler karşılarında hiçbir şeyin duramayacağını sanır. Dümdüz gider, hızlandıkça hızlanırlar. Engelleri tamamen göz ardı eder, körlemesine gidenlerin uçurumu çok geç fark edeceğini unuturlar.
es: Le había hecho notar un proverbio Bene Gesserit: «Cuando religión y política viajan en el mismo carro, los viajeros piensan que nada podrá detenerles en su camino. Su movimiento es acelerado... rápido y más rápido y más rápido. Dejan a un lado todos los obstáculos, y no piensan que un precipicio se descubre siempre demasiado tarde.»
vi_translation: She quoted a Bene Gesserit proverb to him: "When religion and politics ride in the same cart, the riders believe nothing can stand in their way. Their movement becomes headlong—faster and faster and faster. They put aside all thoughts of obstacles and forget that the abyss is only revealed to those who are blind and speeding heedlessly when it is too late."
tr_translation: Paul had been told a Bene Gesserit proverb: "When religion and politics ride in the same cart, the drivers believe nothing can stand in their way. They go straight ahead, gaining speed as they go. They ignore all obstacles, forgetting that those who blindly go forward will notice the precipice too late."
es_translation: He had pointed out a Bene Gesserit proverb: "When religion and politics travel in the same cart, the travelers believe nothing can stand in their way. Their movement accelerates... faster and faster and faster. They leave all obstacles aside, and do not think that a precipice is always discovered too late."

en: He touched the nezhoni scarf at her forehead where it protruded from her stillsuit cap. “Why will you not talk about the sietch?”
vi: Chàng chạm tay vào chiếc khăn choàng nezhoni lộ ra trên trán nàng, dưới chiếc mũ sa phục. “Sao em không nói về sietch nhỉ?”
tr: Paul, Chani’nin damıtıcı-giysi başlığından kenarı çıkmış nezhoni eşarbına dokundu. “Niye siyeçten bahsetmek istemiyorsun?
es: Paul tocó el pañuelo nezhoni que ella llevaba en la frente, bajo el capuchón del destiltraje. —¿Por qué no quieres hablarme del sietch?
vi_translation: He touched the nezhoni scarf revealed on her forehead, beneath the veil hat. “Why don't you talk about the sietch?”
tr_translation: Paul touched the nezhoni scarf that had slipped from the edge of Chani's stillsuit hood. “Why don't you want to talk about the siyech?”
es_translation: Paul touched the nezhoni handkerchief that she wore on her forehead, under the hood of the stillsuit. —Why don't you want to talk to me about the sietch?

en: “The children are pleasant. We observe the rites. We have sufficient food. Sometimes one of us may come north to be with her man. Life must go on.”
vi: “Bọn trẻ con thì thú vị. Chúng em theo đúng các nghi thức. Chúng em có đủ thức ăn. Đôi khi một người trong bọn em có thể đi về phía Bắc để được ở bên người đàn ông họ yêu. Cuộc sống phải tiếp diễn.
tr: “Çocuklar güzeldir. Kurallara uyarız. Yeterince yiyeceğimiz var. Bazen aramızdan birinin, erkeğiyle birlikte olmak için kuzeye gitmesine izin verilir. Soyumuz devam etmeli.
es: —Los niños son agradables. Observamos los ritos. Tenemos suficiente comida. A veces, una de nosotras regresa al norte a dormir con su hombre. La vida debe continuar.
vi_translation: "Children are interesting. We follow the proper rituals. We have enough food. Sometimes one of us can go North to be with the man they love. Life must go on."
tr_translation: “Children are beautiful. We follow the rules. We have enough food. Sometimes one of us is allowed to go north to be with her man. Our lineage must continue.”
es_translation: —The children are nice. We observe the rites. We have enough food. Sometimes, one of us returns to the north to sleep with her man. Life must go on.

en: He knew this was among the alternatives today, a fact along lines of the future radiating from this position in time-space. The imperfect vision plagued him. The more he resisted his terrible purpose and fought against the coming of the jihad, the greater the turmoil that wove through his prescience. His entire future was becoming like a river hurtling toward a chasm—the violent nexus beyond which all was fog and clouds.
vi: Chàng biết điều đó nằm trong những khả năng khác nhau của ngày hôm nay, một sự thực nằm dọc theo những con đường tương lai tỏa ra từ vị trí này trong không-thời gian. Cái thị kiến bất toàn này ám ảnh chàng. Chàng càng cưỡng lại cái mục đích kinh khủng của mình, càng chiến đấu hòng ngăn không cho cuộc thánh chiến xảy ra thì cơn nhiễu loạn giăng chằng chịt qua tầm năng lực tiên tri của chàng càng lớn. Toàn bộ tương lai của chàng đang trở nên giống như một dòng sông hối hả tuôn về phía vực thẳm - cái điểm nút dữ dội mà bên ngoài đó chỉ có mỗi sương mù và mây phủ.
tr: Bugünkü olasılıklardan biri buydu. Zaman-mekândaki bu konumdan yayılan gelecek hatlarından bazılarında yer alan bir gerçeklikti. Kusurlu görüntü, Paul’ün peşini bırakmıyordu. Korkunç gayesine direnerek cihadı engellemeye çalıştıkça, gelecekteki karmaşa artıyordu. Tüm geleceği, uçuruma doğru akan bir nehre dönüşmekteydi... o uçurumun fırıl fırıl dönen girdabının ardındaysa yalnızca sis ve bulutlar görünüyordu.
es: Sabía que esta era una de las alternativas posibles, un hecho a lo largo de las líneas que irradiaban hacia el futuro a partir de aquella posición en el espacio-tiempo. La imperfecta visión le atormentaba. Cuanto más se oponía a su terrible finalidad y luchaba contra el advenimiento del jihad, más se aceleraba el torbellino en un río precipitándose en un abismo... un vórtice de violencia donde todo era niebla y nubes.
vi_translation: He knew that it lay within the various possibilities of today, a truth lying along the paths of the future branching out from this position in space-time. This imperfect vision haunted him. The more he resisted his dreadful purpose, the more he fought to prevent the jihad from happening, the greater the turmoil that spread through his prophetic abilities. His entire future was becoming like a rushing river flowing towards an abyss - the violent nexus point beyond which there was only mist and clouds.
tr_translation: This was one of today's possibilities. It was a reality present in some of the future lines emanating from this point in time-space. The flawed vision was not leaving Paul alone. As he tried to resist its terrible purpose and prevent the jihad, the future chaos increased. All of the future was turning into a river flowing towards an abyss... and beyond the swirling vortex of that abyss, only mist and clouds were visible.
es_translation: He knew that this was one of the possible alternatives, a fact along the lines that radiated towards the future from that position in space-time. The imperfect vision tormented him. The more he opposed his terrible purpose and fought against the advent of the jihad, the more the whirlwind accelerated in a river rushing into an abyss... a vortex of violence where everything was fog and clouds.

en: It was not yet time for the nightly prayer of parting. They wouldn’t have started a birth celebration near the time of ceremony that mourned the slave raids of Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak, and Harmonthep.
vi: Vẫn chưa đến giờ cầu nguyện buổi tối dành cho cuộc chia ly. Người ta sẽ chỉ bắt đầu buổi lễ sinh thành vào gần thời điểm tiến hành nghi lễ than khóc những cuộc vây bắt nô lệ ở Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak và Harmonthep.
tr: Her gece edilen ayrılık duasının vakti henüz gelmemişti anlaşılan. Yoksa Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak ve Harmonthep’e yapılan köle akınlarında katledilenler için düzenlenen törenden hemen önce kutlama yapmazlardı.
es: Aún no era el momento de la plegaria nocturna de la separación. No habrían iniciado la celebración de un nacimiento a tan poca distancia de la ceremonia en la que se lloraban las incursiones en busca de esclavos de Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak y Harmonthep.
vi_translation: It is not yet time for the evening prayer dedicated to the farewell. The ceremony of creation will only begin near the time of the lamentation ritual for the slave raids on Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak, and Harmonthep.
tr_translation: It seemed that the time for the nightly prayer for separation had not yet come. Otherwise, they would not have celebrated just before the ceremony held for those massacred in the slave raids on Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak, and Harmonthep.
es_translation: It was not yet the time for the night prayer of separation. They would not have started the celebration of a birth so close to the ceremony where they mourned the raids in search of slaves from Poritrin, Bela Tegeuse, Rossak, and Harmonthep.

en: A dark hand inserted itself through the hangings beside her, deposited a cup upon the table and withdrew. From the cup arose the aroma of spiced coffee.
vi: Một bàn tay đen đúa lùa qua đám rèm bên cạnh bà, đặt một chiếc tách lên bàn rồi rút lui. Từ chiếc tách dậy lên mùi cà phê pha hương dược.
tr: Yanındaki perdeler aralandı ve içeri uzanan esmer bir el, masanın üstüne bir fincan bırakıp geri çekildi. Fincandan baharatlı kahve kokusu yükseliyordu.
es: Una oscura mano apareció entre los cortinajes, a su lado, depositó una taza sobre la mesilla y se retiró. De la taza se elevó el aroma del café de especia.
vi_translation: A blackened hand slipped through the curtain beside her, placed a cup on the table, and then withdrew. From the cup arose the scent of coffee infused with medicinal herbs.
tr_translation: The curtains beside him parted, and a tanned hand reaching inside placed a cup on the table and withdrew. A spicy coffee aroma was rising from the cup.
es_translation: A dark hand appeared between the curtains, placed a cup on the table beside it, and withdrew. The aroma of spiced coffee rose from the cup.

en: And she wondered what other society would have such a natural regard for her privacy and comfort that the giver would intrude only enough to deposit the gift and not inflict her with the donor? Respect and love had sent the gift—with only a slight tinge of fear.
vi: Và bà tự hỏi có xã hội nào khác biết tôn trọng sự riêng tư và tự do thoải mái của bà một cách tự nhiên đến nỗi người phục vụ chỉ len vào vừa đủ để đặt quà xuống mà không buộc bà phải tiếp kẻ dâng quà. Lòng tôn trọng cùng tình yêu thương đã đưa món quà đến, chỉ nhuốm thêm chút nào đó nỗi e sợ.
tr: Başka hangi toplumda özel hayata ve rahatlığa böylesine doğal bir saygı gösteriliyordu ki? Kahveyi veren kişi yalnızca elini uzatıp fincanı bırakmış ve geri çekilmiş, kendini göstermemişti. Bu armağan sevgi ve saygıyla; biraz da korkuyla verilmişti.
es: Y se preguntó qué otra sociedad mostraría aquel respeto natural por su intimidad y confort, hasta el punto de que el donante se introducía en su estancia tan sólo el tiempo suficiente para depositar su presente, sin siquiera presentarse a ella. Había respeto y amor en aquel obsequio... con tan sólo una ligerísima huella de miedo.
vi_translation: And she wondered if there was any other society that naturally respected her privacy and comfort to the extent that the servant would just slip in enough to place the gift down without forcing her to meet the gift bearer. The respect and love that brought the gift were tinged with a certain amount of fear.
tr_translation: In what other society was such a natural respect for privacy and comfort shown? The person who served the coffee had simply extended their hand, placed the cup, and withdrawn without showing themselves. This gift was given with love and respect; and a little bit of fear.
es_translation: And she wondered what other society would show such natural respect for her privacy and comfort, to the point that the donor would enter her room only long enough to leave their gift, without even introducing themselves to her. There was respect and love in that gift... with just the slightest trace of fear.

en: “I would go south, Stilgar—twenty thumpers. I would see this land we make, this land that I’ve only seen through the eyes of others.”
vi: “Tôi sẽ đi về phía Nam, Stilgar ạ - hai mươi dùi gọi. Tôi sẽ thấy vùng đất chúng ta tạo ra, cái vùng đất mà cho tới giờ tôi chỉ thấy qua mắt người khác.”
tr: “Güneye gitmek istiyorum Stilgar... yirmi gümleyicilik bir yolculuk yapmak istiyorum. Yarattığımız o diyarı görmek istiyorum; şimdiye kadar sadece başkalarının gözünden gördüm.
es: —Quiero ir al sur, Stilgar... veinte martilleadores. Así veré el país que estamos creando, la tierra que sólo he visto con los ojos de los demás.
vi_translation: “I will go south, Stilgar - twenty thumpers call. I will see the land we have created, the land that until now I have only seen through the eyes of others.”
tr_translation: “I want to go south, Stilgar... I want to make a journey of twenty thumpers. I want to see that land we created; until now, I have only seen it through the eyes of others.”
es_translation: —I want to go south, Stilgar... twenty hammermen. That way I will see the land we are creating, the land I have only seen through the eyes of others.

en: A great figure loomed out of the rocks above her, beckoning for speed. She quickened her pace. Dawn birds already were calling and lifting into the sky. A dim spread of light grew across the eastern horizon.
