vi: Từ những tảng đá phía trên nàng xuất hiện một dáng người cao lớn, ra hiệu bảo nàng mau lên. Nàng rảo bước nhanh hơn. Những con chim bình minh đang vừa kêu vừa cất cánh bay lên bầu trời. Một dải ánh sáng lờ mờ càng lúc càng tỏa rộng dọc chân trời phía Đông.
tr: Tepesindeki kayalarda beliren iri yarı bir adam çabuk olmasını işaret edince adımlarını hızlandırdı. Şafak kuşları ötmeye, uçuşmaya başlamıştı bile. Doğu göğüne hafif bir aydınlık yayılıyordu.
es: Una figura alta se dibujó entre las rocas por encima de ella, haciéndole señas de que se apresurara. Avanzó más aprisa. Los pájaros del alba empezaban a alzarse en el cielo lanzando sus reclamos. Una pálida claridad empezaba a diseñarse en el horizonte, por el este.
vi_translation: From the rocks above, a tall figure appeared, signaling her to hurry up. She quickened her pace. The dawn birds were chirping and taking flight into the sky. A faint strip of light gradually spread along the eastern horizon.
tr_translation: When a burly man appeared on the rocks above and signaled for him to hurry, he quickened his steps. The dawn birds had already started to chirp and fly. A faint light was spreading across the eastern sky.
es_translation: A tall figure appeared among the rocks above her, beckoning her to hurry. She moved faster. The dawn birds began to rise in the sky, calling out. A pale light started to appear on the horizon, to the east.

en: “There’ve always been such reports. Some were investigated—long ago. A few plants were seen. Many ’thopters were lost. Much too costly, Your Majesty. It’s a place where men cannot survive for long.”
vi: “Luôn có những bản báo cáo nói thế. Một vài bản được điều tra - từ rất lâu rồi. Người ta có thấy ít cây cối. Nhiều tàu chim bị mất tích. Rất hao tiền tốn của, thưa Bệ hạ. Đó là nơi mà con người không thể sống sót lâu dài.
tr: “Öyle raporlar hep gelir. Bazı araştırmalar yapıldı... çok eskiden. Tek tük bitkiler görenler oldu. Ama çok topter kaybettik. Bu iş fazla pahalıya patlıyor Majesteleri. Zaten orada bir insanın uzun süre sağ kalabilmesi mümkün değil.
es: —Siempre ha habido tales informes. Algunos han dado lugar a investigaciones... hace mucho tiempo. Han sido vistas algunas plantas. Muchos tópteros se han perdido. Esto cuesta demasiado caro, Vuestra Majestad. Es un lugar donde uno no puede sobrevivir por mucho tiempo.
vi_translation: “There are always reports saying so. Some were investigated - a long time ago. Few trees were seen. Many ships were lost. Very costly, Your Majesty. It is a place where humans cannot survive for long.”
tr_translation: “Such reports always come. Some research was done... a long time ago. There were a few who saw plants. But we lost a lot of topter. This is costing too much, Your Majesty. Besides, it's not possible for a human to survive there for long.”
es_translation: —There have always been such reports. Some have led to investigations... a long time ago. Some plants have been seen. Many ornithopters have been lost. This is too costly, Your Majesty. It is a place where one cannot survive for long.

en: “Silence!” the Emperor roared. He pushed himself forward on his throne. “Do not abuse my intelligence any longer. You stand there in your foolish innocence and—”
vi: “Im đi!” Hoàng đế gầm lên. Người chồm về phía trước trên ngai vàng. “Đừng có lăng mạ trí thông minh của ta thêm nữa. Ngươi đứng trơ khấc đó trong sự ngây thơ ngu dốt mà...”
tr: İmparator, “Sus!” diye gürledi. Tahtında öne eğildi. “Beni aptal yerine koymayı kes. Karşımda durmuş, saf ve masum numarası yaparak...
es: —¡Silencio! —rugió el Emperador. Se levantó del trono—. ¡No abuséis por más tiempo de mi indulgencia! Permanecéis aquí, ante mí, con vuestra estúpida inocencia y...
vi_translation: "Leave!" the Emperor roared. He leaned forward on his throne. "Do not insult my intelligence any further. You stand there in naive ignorance and..."
tr_translation: The Emperor roared, "Silence!" He leaned forward on his throne. "Stop treating me like a fool. Standing before me, pretending to be innocent and naive..."
es_translation: —Silence! —roared the Emperor. He rose from the throne—. Do not abuse my indulgence any longer! You remain here, before me, with your stupid innocence and...

en: The room rumbled and shook around them. There came a sudden cascade of sand behind the throne where the hutment was coupled to the Emperor’s ship. The abrupt flicker-tightening of skin pressure told of a wide-area shield being activated.
vi: Căn phòng rung lên và chao đảo xung quanh họ. Cả một ngọn thác cát bất ngờ xuất hiện sau ngai vàng, nơi căn trại được buộc vào tàu của Hoàng đế. Áp suất trên da mạnh lên đột ngột trong khoảnh khắc cho thấy có một vùng tấm chắn rộng đang được kích hoạt.
tr: Birden salon sarsıldı. Tahtın arkasına, çadırın İmparatorluk gemisiyle temas ettiği kısımdan içeri kum yağmaya başladı. İnsanların derilerinin aniden gerilmesi, bir geniş alan kalkanının çalıştırıldığının göstergesiydi.
es: La estancia retumbó y se estremeció a su alrededor. Una repentina cascada de arena cayó tras el trono, en el punto donde la estructura estaba acoplada a la nave del Emperador. La presión del aire aumentó bruscamente y la piel de los presentes se estremeció cuando un escudo de enormes dimensiones fue activado.
vi_translation: The room shook and swayed around them. An entire cascade of sand suddenly appeared behind the throne, where the camp was tethered to the Emperor's ship. The pressure on the skin suddenly intensified for a moment, indicating that a wide shield area was being activated.
tr_translation: The hall suddenly shook. Sand began to pour in behind the throne, from the part where the tent made contact with the Imperial ship. The sudden tension in people's skins was an indication that a wide-area shield had been activated.
es_translation: The room rumbled and shook around them. A sudden cascade of sand fell behind the throne, at the point where the structure was attached to the Emperor's ship. The air pressure increased sharply and the skin of those present shivered as a shield of enormous dimensions was activated.

en: Out of the sand haze came an orderly mass of flashing shapes—great rising curves with crystal spokes that resolved into the gaping mouths of sandworms, a massed wall of them, each with troops of Fremen riding to the attack. They came in a hissing wedge, robes whipping in the wind as they cut through the melee on the plain.
vi: Bên ngoài bức màn cát xuất hiện một chuỗi những hình dạng chói lòa có trật tự - những đường cong vĩ đại ngày một nhô cao tua tủa những cái chĩa nhọn trong suốt như pha lê, chúng nhanh chóng chuyển thành những cái miệng sâu cát mở toang hoác, những con sâu cát kín nghịt như cả một bức tường, mỗi con đều có lính Fremen cưỡi trên lưng để tấn công. Họ tiến quân tạo thành một hình nêm phát ra tiếng sin sít trên mặt cát, áo choàng bay phần phật trong gió khi họ cắt xuyên qua cuộc hỗn chiến giữa vùng bình nguyên.
tr: Fırtınanın savurduğu kumların arasında dev figürler belirdi... billur mızraklarla dolu, inip kalkan devasa eğriler, kumsolucanlarının açık ağızlarına dönüştü; düzenli ilerleyen solucanlar bir duvar gibiydi ve sırtlarında onları saldırıya yönelten Fremen askerleri vardı. Solucanlar ovada savaşanların arasına tıslayarak dalarken, Fremenlerin cüppeleri rüzgârda dalgalanıyordu.
es: De las nubes de arena estaba surgiendo una compacta hilera de formas resplandecientes... grandes curvas ondulantes con destellos cristalinos que se convirtieron en abiertas bocas de gusanos de arena, una masiva pared de ellos, cada uno con un pelotón de Fremen cabalgando al ataque sobre sus lomos. Llovieron sobre ellos con un silbido y un roce de ropas contra ropas, y hendieron, apartaron, aplastaron el confuso tumulto que reinaba en la planicie.
vi_translation: Outside the curtain of sand appeared a series of orderly, dazzling shapes - great curves rising higher and higher, bristling with crystal-clear spikes, quickly transforming into wide-open mouths of sand, densely packed sandworms like a wall, each ridden by Fremen warriors attacking. They advanced in a wedge formation, emitting a hissing sound on the sand, their cloaks flapping in the wind as they cut through the melee on the plain.
tr_translation: Amidst the sands hurled by the storm, giant figures appeared... filled with crystal spears, the rising and falling massive curves turned into the open mouths of sandworms; the orderly advancing worms were like a wall, and on their backs were Fremen soldiers directing them to attack. As the worms hissed and plunged among those fighting on the plain, the Fremen's robes fluttered in the wind.
es_translation: From the clouds of sand, a compact row of shimmering forms was emerging... large undulating curves with crystalline flashes that turned into open mouths of sandworms, a massive wall of them, each with a squad of Fremen riding into attack on their backs. They rained down upon them with a hiss and the rustle of clothes against clothes, and they cleaved, parted, crushed the confused tumult that reigned on the plain.
